Reviews.Title: Fantastic Item - with Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Fan!

} } } Length:: 1:04 Mins.Updated video and comments.> Video is 640x480, high quality, LED IR ON and Night-Vision ON.> 5 feet then 7 feet. Dark room, then room lights on.> The black target left of the clock is a 6 inch diameter bull's-eye for pellet pistols.> For detail note the small tassel on the right door handle in the 7 feet / lights on version.Thanks to Nick (the seller) for his helpful advice in making this video.============= ORIGINAL REVIEW FOLLOWS =============I decided to buy one after seeing the quick response, by the seller, with regard to the individual that had a problem.Item arrived quickly - ahead of Amazon's estimate - which impressed me as we are on opposite sides of the USA.The other reviews here are positive but brief. I want to add detail. It really IS a sweet little item.I've tried a number of these for office security and MANY are JUNK. Go ahead, check my other product reviews. It's a relief to find one the seller stands behind. Now I do also.1. The unit fits in the palm of your hand. It is a nice travel clock. LED display is not too bright. Tiny and easy to pack. Discrete.UPDATE: If you find the display too bright as a nightstand clock, use a screen protector for a cellphone. For $2 the "High Quality Privacy Screen Protector Verizon BlackBerry Tour 9630 Sprint" (Amazon) covered (and dimmed) the screen but did not block the cam so you won't have to move the protector in the AM for security "duty".2. The AC adaptor is both 110V and 240V - THANK YOU! - so you can use it in Europe / China / etc - outside the USA. My Sonicare toothbrush can't do that. International AC adaptors are a must in my opinion. Travelers: The cord is about 2 feet. See seller comment to this review for longer cord options. Note that it does have a USA plug so for China/Europe you'll need plug adaptors - but you do NOT need a voltage change.3. VIDEO: I intend to use this as a security cam in my hotel room as I travel often for business. A little extra "peace of mind".You can choose 320x240 or 640x480 for video resolution. These choices are pretty standard for security cams. I set it to 640x480 and "high" quality. Looks NICE!!! Obviously, more quality image means more memory used. Follow the seller guide (included - see item 4).BIG PLUS... the IR LED lighting is 940 nm! Who cares? 940nm is invisible to the eye. Many cams use lower nanometer levels which glow RED - the universal signal that you are recording. I viewed THIS item with another IR camera and only then did I confirm the lighting was "on". Nice!NOTE: See the first comment to this review, from Nick (the seller), regarding the amount of video time per gigabyte of memory.4. The instructions included are TINY - but the seller forwards you a LARGE size version PLUS a two-page "get started" guide. I was functioning in under 10 minutes. Follow the seller's guide step-by-step. Honestly, if you have a micro SD card reader you are ready to go in no time at all. No software necessary. There is a micro DVD included - with English User's Manual, video example, etc - but I found the seller doc more useful.5. When you check your micro SD card you will see FOUR folders have been added - Music, Pictures, Rec, VideoAny use of the cam goes into the "Rec" folder (there is another "video" folder in "Rec"). Why mention this? Because it really IS a clock/radio/MP3 player combination. I put a set of songs into the "Music" folder and it plays them well. Sound is not bad - considering it's so small. It will also auto advance to the next song. I'm listening to it now. If you have an iPhone or iPod you might not use it - but then an iPhone doesn't have night vision.6. Mine is silver - as in the first photo above (detail page). Some of the photos show other colors. I'm happy with silver. I think that is the default. Contact the seller if you have a question.7. Travelers... it has a small pull-string sack to carry it. That will help protect it - and the accessories - in your luggage.***** The clock has no alarm ***** But it has so many other features (cam, true IR, radio, mp3 player, etc) the lack of alarm is not a deal breaker (for me).------------Bottom line: The item is impressive. Make sure you're buying from onlineenterprises888. Don't know him. Not connected in any way. But I have to admit the item and the service make the purchase risk free.That's how it should be. Thanks!!.

Reviews.Title: Update-Admissable in court & Success!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I have to say I too bought this because of the great reviews on the seller onlineenterprises888 and the great reviews on his help and support. I knew I needed some kind of nannycam being in a certain family situation where I need proof of what is actually happening. I must say without his YouTube video and his instructions and other reviewers instructions, I would not have been able to do this. Everyone helped with what to buy to make this work right away so I ordered the camera, the 32 scan disk and the privacy screen. So there everything was, just sitting in the box for a few days, with me looking at it sideways every once and awhile, saying I have to set this up. Tomorrow the family member is coming over so I said ok, I will have to try & set this up today even though I am not too good at setting up these types of things. But after watching the video and pausing it often so I could keep up or rewinding it & watching parts agsin, I did it. Eureka! It works! I have it set up in the living room under the lamp so it just looks like a digital clock. I will update this post after tomorrow's visit by my Bipolar family member when I see how well it recorded his visit. Stay tuned....Oh, also I asked onlineenterprises888 a question here on the question and answer section and he answered right away. Very impressive, Thank you!*************************************************************************************OK, now for the update, of course he didn't come the next day, he didn't come til Sunday. The camera caught everything. After viewing it & listening to it, everyone now saw & heard his actual behavior and can't believe the way he talks to me. Everyone now says I need to get a restraining order against him. I had told him I had a nannycam before he came and reminded him I had a nannycam recording all of this and he said if he finds it he will smash it. You could see him looking around for it but he never noticed this clock. This one recording was worth the cost of the camera to me. Nobody would believe me before. I even played it for his mother up north and she could hear it fine over the phone. This is a great product! Not to mention a great seller! At first, I couldn't get the audio to play when I plugged the device on the computer and was so disappointed, then I went to the questions & answers on this page and followed the suggestions. It played audio & video fine on the actual device, it was my computer that needed the VLC media player free download for windows to play the audio & video, and it now plays great on the computer! !******************************************************************************************OK, for the latest update, so I filed the temporary restraining order and we had court today for the final hearing/injunction. I took the camera into court & the judge allowed the video recording into evidence and had me play the recording right there in the courtroom. The audio was fantastic. They were all impressed that it was a stand alone device. I set it up on the table that I was sitting at for the Petitioner and everyone was able to hear everything even though the judge was about 15 feet away sitting high up on the bench and the court reporter was sitting next to him. The video was too small of course for them to see from that far but they didn't need to see it anyway, all they had to do was listen to the verbal violence that was going on. Even the defendant could hear it across the room at his table.After listening to the recording, the judge granted me the final injuntion. I am so impressed with this device and that the legal system here in Florida allows this as evidence and am so impressed that it worked so well as a stand alone device - no need for computers, no need for any cords or even a power source. It ran off it's own battery in the courtroom. This has been the best money I have ever spent! No one can fully appreciate what you can only describe, hearing it for their selves, what really happened, allows them to understand what you are going through and what the true experience entailed. I urge anyone in a similar situation to get this camera, the judge was denying all other injunctions today but this camera showed the court the proof that I needed this injunction and what could the defendant say in his defense? This was better than a person as a witness. The court had no need to doubt the veracity of this evidence, the court was able to make their decision based on the actions of the defendant which they could hear for themselves!*********************************************************************************

Reviews.Title: No able to achieve the intended result
Reviews.Author: berthan
Reviews.Content: I have no prior experience with spy camera and cannot give a fair comparison with other similar product. My comments are based purely on my intended usage. I suspect my domestic help is stealing items from us; based on the good reviews here, I brought 2 of it. However, the following are my feedback:Good:1. Reliable. It can record as promised2. Hidden its true purpose quite well; you don't suspect it is a spy cam.3. Has a good sound quality (why? I need good recording functions .. not good sound quality)Not so good:1. Very narrow angle of view.(45degree or less) - In a normal size bedroom. you probably need 2 or 3 of these to cover all corners.2. Low quality video, especially in low light condition.3. when recording, it can only function the dual role of a clock. you can't record while it functions as a radio (my domestic helper switch it to radio and the recording stops)4. NO motion detection alert. So you have to review all recordings.I set to 1 hour recording per file (max) and I need 2 of these to just cover 80% of the room. Without motion detection, It means that I need to review 20+ recording files after a long work day. It is just too time consuming. In one of these heap of files, I saw some suspicious activities. However, the recording is so poor that I cannot draw a conclusion.It is too time consuming so I am still looking for a better alternative.

Reviews.Title: Works for me.
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Wehe
Reviews.Content: I use this to monitor my home while at work. I turn on the recording when I leave the house and off when I return. The unit in plugged into the AC charger all the time and since I have the spy camera set to loop record there is no need to delete files from the device ever.

Reviews.Title: Was skeptical
Reviews.Author: ben cooper
Reviews.Content: I'm a college student living with five other guys. Everyone kept having money and personal items go missing. I researched and researched looking for something like this. I kept seeing this product but the reviews made me very skeptical. After not being about to find anything better I purchased this. It has only been two days but the thing works great. Its a lot smaller than in the pictures. It has a rechargeable battery. I purchased the SD card in the combo. It takes the miniSD cards. The instructions came in english and were semi-helpful. I had my other roommate who is into computers set it up. Picture is great for the price and covers a wide area. Audio works great to. Showed up in 2 days.

Reviews.Title: never would record.
Reviews.Author: Lance P.
Reviews.Content: A big waste of money. We ordered the 32GB card with this "camera" and it would never record or it would freeze and we would have to unplug, restart, and reprogram, several times. I finally gave up out of fear of throwing it against my wall and possibly damaging my wall. Don't waste your money, save yourself the frustration.

Reviews.Title: Super poor quality all around
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Gamer"
Reviews.Content: Crashed after 1 and a half hours. Had to remove battery to get past the crash (on/off didnt work to turn it off).crashed again after starting up after the crash (quicker this time, not sure of the minutes/hours though).Super SHORT usb/charge cable. 1 foot or shorter. No lie.Same short audio to audio cable, so you cant even have the device near a plug, and then have a long audio cable to the device you plug it into.Speakers were pretty dang good sounding though. Until the crash. After the crash, they sounded a bit tin-ish.No built in drive. You have to buy your own sd card for it for video/survelience.Lettering on the already too tiny (super small) instruction 'booklet' is so small, my magnifying glass couldnt even let me read it. Seriously.Dont waste money on this junk.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I read several reviews saying this camera was hard to operate however I found it very easy. Just a few buttons and you are recording. The camera looks like a small alarm clock. Very discrete. Great picture too. Love this little camera.

Reviews.Title: It's a neat device that pretty much does the job - but has some flaws
Reviews.Author: Stealthy like a cat
Reviews.Content: This device is packed with features but is not perfect:Speakers sound very good for a device of this size.Video quality both for display and camera are very good.Overall design is appealing, clock display also looks pretty slick.Technically works pretty well as an always-on security cam.The removable battery is a nice touch, like having a built-in UPS.I'm glad it takes the micro SD cards because I've got lots of those laying around.I took off a star (and a half) for the following reasons:On a device that is otherwise very advanced, why did they not add motion detection at all?  A true mystery.I'm OK with it being military time but some would not like that.The unit gets quite warm, just bordering on wondering whether it is safe to run 24x7.The A/C to USB adapter that came with the unit also got quite warm.  Since it is standard, I swapped mine out with a regular adapter to resolve the issue.I give this a 3.5 overall.

Reviews.Title: For the money it's probably one of the best covert video recorders available in this price range.
Reviews.Author: D L
Reviews.Content: Rare among low-cost Chinese-made video "spy" electronics, this one actually works!Although the field-of-view is somewhat narrow (I'd guess about 30 degrees) it is adequate to capture a 10-foot area if the camera is back about six feet or so.The resolution at "high quality" is standard TV 640 x 480; good enough to recognize people for security purposes but not what we'd call "Hi Def" by any means.The IR LED's are kind of useless, produce lens flare when the subject is close and don't have much range, plus they lend a wierd color cast to the images since when they are turned on the camera still runs in normal-color mode instead of the "IR-green" you are probably familiar with.But there are some positives:1. It works reliably! This is something I can't say about the majority of Chinese-made miniature camera equipment. I had a LawMate 500 pocket DVR (was about $400 nback in the day) -which self-destructed and became useless after a couple of years of use... I recently had a "Spy Pen" which worked once then self-destructed, useless.This little Mini Clock Radio actually works, and the display screen will work to review the video it takes.2. It is discreet -ish. Though the lights are bright on the display and there is an LED that illuminates the translucent base (why?) in a way it is discreet by hiding in plain sight. Some covert nanny-cams are invisible, hiding in clocks or teddy-bears, but this one hides by being obvoiusly 'there'.3. The thing actually sounds pretty good as a powered extension speaker. Surprisingly good, actually, as an iPod speaker.4. As a security recorder, I'm able to get just over 24 hours' recording time on a class-10 Adata micro-SD at "full" resolution and image size. Under most circumstances this will be sufficient to transfer the incriminating video before the unit records over the starting point. There is no start and end-timer that I could see. It's either recording all the time, or it isn't.On the down side:-I had a hard time getting it to play videos recorded on other equipment. I tried various compression schemes and formats, and results were usually "can't play video" or some such message. That's OK because it as not purchased to BE an entertainment device, but it would be good to be able to play somthing in order to show people how it was a "normal" media player and establish a cover story for the device.-Although it records well onto a 16-Gig card, if I try to format the card in the device it errors out, saying. "no card found", yet it is in the slot and plays video. The onboard OS was probably set up for an 8-gig card.There is actually no alarm-clock function- it has a clock, and ostensibly a radio in it (though I couldn' pick up any stations in the couple minutes i tried- it doesn't seem to have the ability to set an alarm time and then play media, again, another useful feature that could help establish its "bona-fides" to the unwitting as a plain clock radio. But oh well.As a nanny-cam, sitting on an office shelf, or on a fireplace mantle, in a kitchen, this little unit would blend right in, as a digital clock. I think for the money it's probably one of the best covert video recorders available in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: EdMel
Reviews.Content: Received it in a timely manner but the thing doesn't work. Will not recognize the memory card and I tried 2 different cards that work in other devices. Also the radio doesn't pick up any stations only sound it makes is static. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: A+ Product!
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: I did my research when it came to purchasing a spy camera. I travel often for work and needed something discreet for my hotel rooms as I have encountered a few unfortunate instances where things have gone missing :(. This product is amazing on so many levels. First, when it is recording, there is virtually no way for a person to tell that it is recording as there is no red light! A lot of 'spy cams' lack this feature and it completely defy's the purpose of the product. Additionally, the product also serves as an alarm clock and iPod speakers (surprisingly good quality speakers! I actually ended up preferring this to my $150 iHome - definitely wasn't expecting that!) Next, when the device is powered up, the screen reveals a variety of options (ie: radio, input, mp3, photos, video, etc) and will not show anything involving a hidden camera unless you know the code that takes you to that screen. The quality of the video produced is much better than I expected, I can clearly see everything within a 20 foot radius. I have shown all my friends and they are all so surprised at how great the product is, especially for the price!! They all want one now :) I told them to purchase from onlineenterprises as the customer service he provides is outstanding. That is one of the most important aspects that I consider when it comes to online shopping, because lets face it: products break and things go wrong and it all comes down to how the emphasis the seller places on customer service (which this seller definitely has). This seller also includes a 1 year warranty with the product which definitely provided a piece of mind for me. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a discreet, hidden camera!!

Reviews.Title: What a very nice stuff.
Reviews.Author: Darlingco S. Quidasol
Reviews.Content: This is a very good gadget because you can use it as speaker, radio, clock and spy camera. I like this small gadget.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the price
Reviews.Author: Ryon Allen
Reviews.Content: Product is difficult to use and freezes while recording. It isn't effective at recording while you're away because you're never sure it is working.

Reviews.Title: This thing is Great!!
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: After figuring out how to play back a recording - plug the usb into your computer, click the REC folder then the VIDEO folder, then choose your video file.  It's amazingly good quality for such a small unit.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: Neat Gadget, clear picture/video, not difficult to operate, and great product support. This product does what it promises to do. The USB cable is a little short depending on where you would like to place the clock, but I simply purchased a longer cable from Sears for less than $5.00.

Reviews.Title: Poor Product Quality
Reviews.Author: Jason Younes "Marv"
Reviews.Content: Was a little buggy at first but it was workable.  But after a month it stopped working.Pros: TinyCons:  Breaks, does not have motion sensor, could not get the night vision to work.I would not pay the listed price for this product.  The most I would have been satisfactory in paying is $20.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: SOL
Reviews.Content: I tried it for a couple of days without luck. It did not record despite the record light indicating otherwise. I had to return it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: This product does not work. Do not purchase
Reviews.Author: Maryam Al-hammami
Reviews.Content: This product worked for one month, long enough for me not to be able to return it, and then began corrupting my micro sd card and will not record, even after purchasing a new sd card. DO not waste your money on this product,

Reviews.Title: Caught the person....videos don't lie!
Reviews.Author: Vicki McKinney
Reviews.Content: Small, discreet, multi-tasking unit does everything it says! It worked beautifully & caught the person who was "helping themselves" to someone elses prescription medication.....so it surely worked for me & I couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: product works fine so far
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: I own this unit for about 6 weeks now, and so far it works pretty good. From my experience so far I would recommend it - here is some (hopefully) relevant info about this clock/camera:- unit is small, but feels pretty sturdy and well-crafted- I leave it plugged into an outlet - the rechargeable battery alone lasts 4 hours when recording (according to the seller), and about a day without recording (according to me)- get a USB extension cable - the USB cord supplied does not reach an outlet close to the ground if the clock is on a table- video resolution can be set to 640 x 480; out of the box it was 320 x 240- video settings (resolution, video quality, night mode, etc) can be changed when you are in recording mode, and go to <monitor settings> using the volume forward or reverse buttons (thanks to Inspector Gadget for mentioning this in his review!)- out of the box, night vision is weak - can be improved by going into <monitor settings> and set <DV night mode> to "on"; it was "off" out of the box, even though it still had some IR recording capabilities (? - not sure why) - anyway, with <DV night mode> on, you get an OK-ish quality 6-7 feet range in a completely dark room- Mini SD card that comes with the package deal is a class 4 card- out of the box it records 30 min clips, each clip is approx. 30-50 MB in size (for 320x240) or 200-300MB (for 640x480 in high quality) - so for an overnight recording, you would find 20+ clips, each 30 min long, in the morning (video clip length can be changed in <monitor settings> to either 10min, 30min, or 1hr)- this also implies that you get about 15 days of continuous recording on a 16GB card on the lowest 320x240 setting; on the better 640x480 setting, your 16GB card is filled up after about 3 days.- MAC users: this unit gives me a weird problem: when I connect it directly via USB, it keeps mounting multiple desktop icons (and by that I mean many, i.e. >10, and just keeps going). Somewhat annoying, so I just pop out the SD card, put it into an adapter and put that in my iMac. Takes 5 seconds and works nicely. Anybody else encountered this issue, with either Mac or PC?- MAC users: there might be a difference playing videos when using QuickTime Player versus other players (VLC, MPlayerX etc) in regards to sound

Reviews.Title: Complete junk.
Reviews.Author: AK
Reviews.Content: I've been using Amazon for a long time and have never returned my purchases. This one is the first to be sent back. Apparently, as a simple digital clock it works just fine. However, when you switch to a security surveillance mode to set up the hidden camera, the interface halts every single time. The only way to restart it is to pull out the battery. Long story short this thing does not work at all. To say nothing you need a microscope to read the manual. I wish there were negative rate values. Complete junk.

Reviews.Title: Too simple, too cheap, cannot program dependably, sometimes, yes,
Reviews.Author: lil bubba
Reviews.Content: It is impossible to program.  After setting the time from the year 2087, how many clicks is that??? it goes back to 2087.  Set it at 15:45, at the hour it goes to 4:00.  Hold two buttons, mode, menu, escape, ok, the definitions of those changes depending on what you're trying to do.  Pamplet written is poor english.  I'm sending mine back.

Reviews.Title: Do your homework. this may not work for you.
Reviews.Author: mindi hansen
Reviews.Content: it records in 2 minute clips and won't record after that 2 minutes are up if the movement is the same as it was in the last 2 minute clip.IE: A person is playing a violin, arm goes back and forth. This will be recorded for 2 minutes, then recording ends. The recording will not start again until the violin player does something OTHER than move arm back and forth - like finish the song and put the bow down. Result - you taped 2 minutes of a 5 minutes of action.A motion camera should record motion - regardless if that motion is erratic or constant.If you look closely at the face of the clock you can see the camera.. I found if the movement in the room is consistent (Think playing a violin) the recorder will not

Reviews.Title: It will get the job done. Good nanny cam.
Reviews.Author: Yolanda Klem
Reviews.Content: Once I watched the sellers youtube video, the product worked as stated. It records in color, infrared, night. You cannot "skip" chapters  (only Fastforward) during playback so chose your recording increments wisely. The USB cable is short. Spend the $5-$7 for an extension cable as the battery only last 3-4 hrs on full charge. Great picture ad the audio is much better than expected although it seems low and I had to turn all volumes up on my computer. Tip: turn the unit off, then plug into your computer, then turn back on and your computer will recognize the device. I never got the CD ROM with the large manual to work, but again, the youtube video answered most questions. Also, the battery light does not go off unless the unit is off. I hate this as it is annoying to have the screen dark but the light on underneath. Also, the time date seems to reset itself from year 2014 to 2088. Just crazy. Anyway, neat product and it will get the job done barring frustrations.

Reviews.Title: Does the job, But .....
Reviews.Author: William J. Morgan
Reviews.Content: It does capture decent video in a lighted room, but not good enoughat night. However most people will turn on a light if not aware they arebeing recorded. - High quality recording does use much more than 1gb/day. I estimate  about 8 gb/day. - Thought I could read the micro HD memory directly on my laptop reader,but  it does not recognize the spycam file system. You must connect the spycam  to your PC to read files - much like a digital camera. - Reviewing video on the spycam itself is tricky - I often skipped over files without  realizing it. Best to connect to PC and review there. - You need a longer USB cable to power the device - the provided one is very short. - The paper user guide is worthless, tiny print. PDF file on provided disk is OK.  Even with manual, takes a while to learn the device & how to operate it.

Reviews.Title: more information needed.
Reviews.Author: ralph navarrete
Reviews.Content: I am now enjoying the benefits of this product and would recommend it to others.  My only complaint would be the difficult instructions and lack of customer support.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Serend
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend this product.  It looks great and works well without any problems.  It looks like a regular clock so no one will know its part of your home security.

Reviews.Title: Great discrete recorder
Reviews.Author: Dawn Natzke
Reviews.Content: I love how it is a common item that is so discrete.  It's not easy to push a button and see that it is a recording device.  There is no reason for anyone to believe that it is anything more than a cute little clock.  The video is choppy, but it does its job.  It is able to pick up sounds that are way in another room.  I'm very happy and it was a great investment.

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your money
Reviews.Author: Holly Elliott "holly"
Reviews.Content: This was NOT fully as described. It didnt work unless pluged in 24-7. Everytime it got unpluged i had to go though the settings and re set everything so it saved with the right date and time. I ended up throwing it in the trash.... Extremely disapointed that the battery that came with it was just for show and didnt do a dang thing for it. Also the "secret functions" my sitter figured out how to use and shut the recording off and things of that nature. Its a NOT So Secret Spy cam.

Reviews.Title: Not good spy gear
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: If your using this for personal use to secure an area you maintain then great. I bought this to place in my teen daughters room to monitor activity and people when I'm not home, the S&S; card slot is plain as day on the back and she just has to pop it out and I have nothing, not very good job trying to hide the fact it's a spy camera.

Reviews.Title: An unusual find!
Reviews.Author: Nat
Reviews.Content: Loving this clock and it performs all the functions it says it does.Will come in handy for dorm life ( had a friend lose some things in a dorm and want to keep an eye on my stuff while I'm in college).  My biggest advice is to watch the seller's video he posted so you can learn all the functions, but it's actually quite easy once you get the hang of it. I missed that at first, and didn't know the clock could play it's own video back without a computer, but it can! It's just very discreet and has great security--something you'd want from a monitoring clock like this. Another thing I love is it came with a jack for you to connect your mp3 player and play music, and headphones and a carrying pouch, and a little disk ( I think that's instructions for the computer). It also has a webcam function but my computer already had one so meh.HD picture looks great. Sound is great, and it works in the dark which I'm loving for when I'm at evening classes. Seller answered all my questions and helped get the clock to me when Amazon had some issues. Highly recommended because you'll get great product support. Clock camera works wonderful so far, so hopefully I'll get a good long while of use out of it. Maybe it could use a longer battery life though for longer monitoring sessions. I think that's my only recommendation. This is my first experience with a "spy camera" but it's a well built little item that really comes in handy. It's fun to pick up because it's so portable.

Reviews.Title: Unbeatable price, features, ease of use
Reviews.Author: Brian C.
Reviews.Content: I spent a lot of time researching similar products. Anything else of similar features and ease of use will cost you 4x more.Included features that were a must for me:-Discrete (UV lights are invisible to the eye)-User friendly (watch their video. Google search "youtube VIDEO DEMO! Spy Camera, Top Secret Mini Clock Radio"-Wall plug-in continuous recording (this one runs on battery as well)-Continuous loop recording (this one accepts up to 32gb micro SD, days worth of space before looping)-AUDIO (unless a product specifically says audio, it doesn't have it!)Other nice features:-Displays a small, inconspicuous dot when recording-Has a screen and speakers to play back footage-Hides all camera functions and files unless you know how to get to them.-Also plays files you upload onto it in a different folder, audio, video, pictures-Has aux line in for use as a speaker-Plays radio-Displays time and dateDisadvantages (although few and minor)-Only displays time in 24hr format-No alarm clock feature-A little bright with the clock display-UV lights are only effective for 2-3ft.Go ahead and search for similar products in this price range, there is always something (usually multiple things) that really suck about them.

Reviews.Title: perfect house sitter
Reviews.Author: Reese experience
Reviews.Content: This item get five stars from me b/c it does exactly what I was looking for. It records audio and video consistently, video quality isn't the best but good enough to identify an individual  with their hands in the cookie jar. Its a small box, and the charging cable is short so purchasing a longer charger cable may be ideal. The night vision quality is okay for the money, and learn how to read military time b/c it only show in 24hrs. All in all very easy to operate, perfect eyes when you're not around and for the money you just can't beat the deal.

Reviews.Title: Really?
Reviews.Author: Lacie Johnson "LLJ-JEJ4"
Reviews.Content: Remember those cheap electronics in the back of magazines you could order that were too good to be true? This is one. Menu navigation is horrible ( tap volume 3 times to set camera type, hit menu, select then volume to set blah blah..) Dont waste your money or time. too expensive and no real function. Didn't work for us one bit. Wish i could send it back, will contact amazon to see if they can help.

Reviews.Title: TOP Secret Spy Camera Mini Clock Radio Hidden
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I like it.  The family was a little upset because I didn't tell them what it was until I caught them doing some stupid stuff.  I've got 2 boys still living at home.  I had the camera set up in the living room.  One kid was making out with some girl after school.  The other son was picking his nose and wiping boogers on my sofa.  The camera picks up sound pretty good.  You can even hear the dogs bark outside.  At night, you can't really see anything.  But, in the day time, the picture is nice and clear.  The battery doesn't seem to last long so I usually keep it running for several days while hooked up the the charger.  I still like the camera even if it does a few faults.  At least, during the day, I can tell if somebody comes in the house that's not supposed to be there.  Not to mention, it's cheap too.P.S.  I don't sit on the sofa any more.

Reviews.Title: Very cool
Reviews.Author: Kregger2
Reviews.Content: It actually works the way it says it would. It's very cool. A lot of technology in a small package for the price. I just wish that it would record only during motion. It's a lot of video to screen through

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Pratt
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I expected when I opened it. Very clear picture as well. It has many uses for being so compact.

Reviews.Title: just what I need
Reviews.Author: Lulubelle
Reviews.Content: I was really looking for something like this for a long time. It is well secured in a place that no one can tell it is a spy camera.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Mindy
Reviews.Content: Great little camera and once I looked on YouTube on how to use it I never had a problem with it

Reviews.Title: Syp Cam Works
Reviews.Author: Yashmina Uejima
Reviews.Content: Great item!  It really works surprisingly!  Only complaint night vision is grainy and if theres really no good lighting then it will be hard to see objects (this is only for night and poor lite areas).

Reviews.Title: difficult to use
Reviews.Author: wolfie
Reviews.Content: It is difficult to use.  There is no instruction as to how to view the video recorded on your computer.

Reviews.Title: Had High Expectations
Reviews.Author: JMB
Reviews.Content: First off, before purchasing I decided to do my research and came to the conclusion that this spy camera clock was for me. I should've probably second guessed this purchase though.PROS:- Discreet and small... looks like a legit alarm clock.- Records in orderly fashion on the MicroSD card... which allows you to pull up certain dates and times easily.- Video looks good, even though the view is pretty narrow.CONS:- Battery life is just plain bad... it's been 2 months since I got it and it doesn't hold a charge at all.- No alarm clock... that's a huge drawback in my opinion.- Constantly freezes and the on/off switch in the back doesn't work.- Doesn't save time and date settings... if I have to pull the battery it resets the whole device.- IR night vision isn't its strong suit... only lights up objects that are about 2-3 feet in front of it.My Final Opinion:I've read plenty of other reviews on this product that were positive, so I thought I'd have a great experience... instead it turns out I ordered an expensive miniature "alarm" clock with no alarm, because if I press any buttons it freezes up and I have to pull the battery so right now it just sits.I probably just got a defective one, which doesn't seem very uncommon with this product. I hate to write this review since the main guy that sells these, "onlineenterprises888" seems like a really nice and helpful guy.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!!!
Reviews.Author: Mandi
Reviews.Content: LOVE LOVE LOVE this product! it caught the man molesting my daughter! infrared worked great. sound worked great! arrived in 2 days! loved it!!!

Reviews.Title: a good buy
Reviews.Author: Miguel A Lopez
Reviews.Content: loop recording provides the great opportunity of not having to clear memory; the clock is clearly visible with bright numbers; can continuously record if connected to power supply.Could offer a loger-lasting battery

Reviews.Title: NOT EASY TO PROGRAM
Reviews.Author: ROB
Reviews.Content: The Camera quality is ok, but it is not easy to program and does not come with a remote. The audio out is very bad. pops like a blown speaker.

Reviews.Title: Complete garbage!
Reviews.Author: L. D. from BK
Reviews.Content: This thing is a complete joke and doesn't work anywhere near advertised. Avoid this junk unit it gets stuck on the first screen.

Reviews.Title: I DO NOT Recommend!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A Land
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera. It did not work. The video was green and yellow.  You could not make out the images. VERY disappointed.  Also, they did not disclose that you had to separately purchase a $50.00 memory card. Kind of like, "Batteries Not Included" disclosure was missing.

Reviews.Title: awful product!!!!
Reviews.Author: Chien-chung Wang
Reviews.Content: I spent several hours.  I did not see any function for recording.  The radio reception was poor, the sound quality was not good as well.  Waste my money.  It's end up I have to return the product.

Reviews.Title: Covert
Reviews.Author: Douglas Lewis
Reviews.Content: Nice little device. Sits in plain sight. Has a night light that obscured IR emitter. No motion detection. Has loop record, so it overwrites oldest files. Works pretty well, but you'll have to pull the card and transfer any files off memory card and return the card to the device.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: peter bell
Reviews.Content: Works exactly as advertised, wish there was an alarm and 12hr mode, and could multitask, but it's awesome for the price

Reviews.Title: Broke after two days
Reviews.Author: Wayne J. Nubile "Nubile"
Reviews.Content: Cheap and not simple to work.  I didn't bother sending it back I just threw it away.  I just wanted to make sure my 12 year old isn't going to burn my house down.  He likes to play with fire and he has 2 hours where he is unattended after school.  Oh well.

Reviews.Title: Awesome video
Reviews.Author: Lisa "Lisa"
Reviews.Content: This little spy cam works really well. The video quality is amazing. Sound is fine. The only thing I don't like about it is the way the controls work. It's a bit of a pain to set it to record and figure out how to make it stop recording, etc. You really have to watch the youtube video on using it, which is not the best way for remembering how to use it. An old-fashioned users manual sure would be nice. The video is good, but takes a long time and goes on too long about the simpler stuff. But it works great.

Reviews.Title: Works but
Reviews.Author: Kathy Ramey
Reviews.Content: This product is more complicated than I like. Being able to access files, and get them to play. It records well, but not the simplest product. Thrown to the wayside. Not being used

Reviews.Title: Does its job, but battery life and interfaces are not optimal
Reviews.Author: Dan S.
Reviews.Content: Battery life is shorter than expected and navigation of the functions from the front panel were not well thought-through. I would recommend it for people who want to record for known time periods, but leaving it on - even overnight - will cause issues.

Reviews.Title: NOT BAD FOR DAY TIME BAD AT NIGHT.
Reviews.Author: Hailu
Reviews.Content: It is good DVR if you use it where good lighting, but at dark it is no good at all.

Reviews.Title: It has drawbacks, but it works
Reviews.Author: DTJ "DTJ"
Reviews.Content: So here's the deal.  It works.  You need a micro SD card.  If you try to eject the card before turning it off, it locks it up.  If that happens, just unplug it and let the battery die then plug it back in and it works fine again.  The video quality is surprisingly good.  The biggest drawback is that it is 24 hour time and in our house, that tends to draw attention.  It takes a minute to figure out how to set it, but once you figure it out, it is easy.  We switched to DropCams which are much more conspicuous, but cest la vie.

Reviews.Title: Video quality is ok, but it needs a motion detector to trigger video recording.
Reviews.Author: steve dummermuth
Reviews.Content: without a motion sensor, you just get two hours of nothing once you leave the room.  It could use a longer cord as well.  Otherwise the way the product is disquised is pretty good.

Reviews.Title: smalll wonder
Reviews.Author: John R
Reviews.Content: recored in low light ... cheap insurance.  I had to buy a longer cord from amazon USB to mini b 5pin  so that it would reach the plug from my dresser.  The cord it comes with is about 1.5 feet long (reason for a knock of a star).  It records continuously in blocks of an hour.  You need to buy a microSD card as well, 32 GB is the largest that you can use.  This gives about 2 days of 680x420 recording.  its very tiny and looks just like a digital alarm clock .  The instruction booklet is in english but the print was so small i had to use the included mini CDrom and pull the PDF version out.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous product, delivers as promises
Reviews.Author: Rachel Cauteruccio
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this "spy" camera because I wanted to find out who was responsible for numerous petty thefts that had been occurring in our office.  We suspected it was happening at night and unfortunately, we were right.  It was a member of the cleaning staff who emptied our wastebaskets every night.  I would like to address the negative comments here by saying...if this camera worked for the reason you purchased it for, then why complain??  Yes, the instructions were a bit hard to follow but he also provides a you tube video to watch. The recording quality is phenomenal and clear, as is the audio.  I could not have been happier with this purchase! The appeal here for me was a) it can plug in and keep recording without running out of power and b) it simply looks like a clock radio.  People mention how the light is a dead giveaway that this is possibly a camera but if you ask me, it just made me think of how on a clock radio, a light is on to signify either AM or PM.  Also, you may want to use an extension cord as the power cord is a bit short.  Hands down this is a winner...

Reviews.Title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
Reviews.Author: Fancy Tate
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed! Was working fantastic, then conveniently after the return deadline, it no longer works! The screen is froze & none of the buttons do anything on it anymore!! Very upset that not even two mos after buying this it no longer works!! What a waste of $. DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!!

Reviews.Title: No frills... Does the job.
Reviews.Author: L. Greene "AddictofCinema"
Reviews.Content: I read all of the reviews and did a lot of research on this product and compared it to others "like it" before buying it.Yay's:- No one will ever know what it's true purpose is.  NO ONE! So feel confident about that if considering this product.  Yes, it's weird to have a micro sd card (REMEMBER TO BUY A MICRO SD CARD 32GB because I didn't pay attention and bought the wrong one) on a radio BUT not if you can upload movies to said radio.  This is all you have to tell the "curious" if they start playing with your new set of eyes.- It can pick up a pin drop.... The sound is AMAZINGLY clearThe NAYS:- Well I was forced to learn military time because that's what is stamped on all recordings... Small nay but a nay.- You can't set it to START recording at a certain time.  It records in a loop and replaces old footage when full or you can set it to record and STOP recording once the micro SD card is full.- FFWRD is NO FUN.  NOT MENTIONED IN INSTRUCTIONS - when you press ffwd key it skips to next video if you don't QUICKLY press OK to STOP the ffwd to view the video... I mean like superman speeding bullet quick! Not really user friendly.. At least, I haven't figured out a trick to make it easy to fast forward without completely jumping too far into the video.- Night vision.. Blah.. Not impressed at all... Its so grainy I kinda sit and wait and watch and expect to see a spooky figure pull a paranormal activity move on me.. Like just pop up on the screen out of nowhere and scare the living crap outta me.  Yea, so, no bueno.With all of that said, there is nothing better than the security of knowing you have a set of eyes at home documenting all that goes on.  I am happy with the purchase and would actually purchase another.

Reviews.Title: Great cam
Reviews.Author: Rizzo
Reviews.Content: After having an open it up and fix the buttons, the product for fine. The only problem I had with the product is the lack of quality control before shipped. Other than that does a great little camera and takes great video.

Reviews.Title: Did not Work!
Reviews.Author: Marcia R.
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this product to anyone.  I read the reviews before buying and thought there were more good reviews than bad ones, so I decided to go ahead and purchase this item.  However, I could not get the item to work at all.  I think the manufacturer tried to put too much into this small product.  It had way too many features for something so small to try to have them all work.  Therefore, I was able to return mine for a full refund.  I will continue to look for something along this line only  a mush better quality.

Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: Kristy Bowens
Reviews.Content: It's small but powerful. It would have been an even better product if it were a little bigger. It's very cute.

Reviews.Title: Room for improvement, but useful
Reviews.Author: Christelleny
Reviews.Content: I have mixed feelings about this secret camera. It did the job, but there's a lot of room for improvement. Yet, compared to other systems I checked in the same price range or a little more expensive, it's the best thing out there - which doesn't say much for the other systems...Pros:- Fairly intuitive user interface once you get the hang of it- Relatively wide angle- Very sensitive sound recording- Small sizeCons:- Could not view recordings on screen; had to hook camera up to my computer to access the REC folder- Couldn't make the fast-forward function work, so had to look at hours and hours of footage at real speed- No mention sensor, so unless you know exactly what time to look for, you'll spend hours viewing sill images- Time on clock and computer don't match - for some reason, there's an hour difference between the time indicated by the camera and the time indicated by the computer in the REC folders- Image quality is not too sharp - it will be blurry on full screen- Ridiculously short cable - you will definitely need an extension- Seems to overheat - not sure how that affects the long-term performance

Reviews.Title: Great service
Reviews.Author: Edward Scott
Reviews.Content: works as described. Instructions well written. Large version easy to understand.  Wish all products made in china were this easy to understand.

Reviews.Title: Very nice video
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: I was surprise the sound of those speakers has, I like it a lot, and the video is pretty clear the only thing is that it has to be light in the room, other wise you won't see a thing.

Reviews.Title: Nice little nanny camera clock
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: The camera works well recording a quality image with good sound pickup.  Included instructions were also quite good, so operating the device is not difficult.I have not used the night mode yet, so may post an update later.I recommend this for anyone who needs a Nanny cam.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Robert B.
Reviews.Content: Clock works great and is exactly as described. Can set auto mode to auto start recording after going into menu to listen to music or watch videos.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Satisfied
Reviews.Author: jeff van cleave
Reviews.Content: This device is working out great for what we're trying to accomplish. The price was great and I'm extremely satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Poor product
Reviews.Author: Bill Hess
Reviews.Content: Awful product and minute instructions. Don't waste your money on this.  Opt for a camera with greater ease of operation.

Reviews.Title: no good
Reviews.Author: ann
Reviews.Content: i also rated this same device under the foscam fhc51 hidden camera that is sold through amazon.  There are both the same product, just listed separately...one is under risest and the other foscam (who is the US distributor, as best I can tell)...I agree with all the one star reviews...had many of the same problems...hopefully my return will make it back before the deadline.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was expecting
Reviews.Author: Kwabena
Reviews.Content: 1. The manual was not helpful2. The location of the menu items could be really confusing3. It does not come with an SD card...but is not noted... you'll have to buy4. I valued it higher that it actually was and paid too much for others which even had wireless functionality.5. When recording a light is on... so not completely hidden... my 8 and 7 year old kids got to know it was a clock with a camera the first time they saw it for only 2 minutes.6. Battery time is very short

Reviews.Title: CLOCK CAM
Reviews.Author: Carnagie Thornhill "bungalowjoe"
Reviews.Content: Here's the thing. When you read a product description by the producer of that product there is neveranything negative about that product....understandably, but that's the thing. These types of reviews bythe actual customers who purchased the said product will give a more honest and accurate account ofhow the product performed under real conditions.  That said, I found the product much less of everything than advertised. Much smaller than I hadexpected. Very difficult to understand the directions and follow through. Practically non existent image in a darken room scenario unlike the description advertised. And lastly, there's nothing covert abouta clock so bright it demands you throw a pillow over it, not to mention the obvious charging cord with a bright red very obvious flashing light.  Finally. I don't like giving bad reviews, but this one deserves it. Perhaps a smarter person couldunderstand the directions and have better luck with it. Good luck with that.

Reviews.Title: Caugth the House Cleaner
Reviews.Author: Tommy
Reviews.Content: Ok you want to catch a Crook , Have this  camera in my bedroom I it leave on when I am away , It has great audio and videoMy house keeper was going thru my things , only small things missing , not waiting for the real stuffBuy One

Reviews.Title: Nice compact size in 12 hours format
Reviews.Author: Rlam
Reviews.Content: There are plenty written regarding seller "Nick".  He is the reason why I bought this from him only.The product was described exactly on his video on YouTube.  This one I ordered is the 12 hours format (which many in the past complained about the military time-24 hours format they didn't like).  The attached English instruction is still a little confusing to me but between the instruction sheet and the video I think I got the unit working the way it should, just a slight learning curve for me.Product is warm to the touch.  I use one of the left over longer USB cord (instead of the short one that came with unit) and pretty much plug anywhere I want.On further communication with Nick, he also assured me that it can be used overseas where current is 220v.  Just need an adapter for the country where I will visit.  Certainly very compact for travel.  I had ordered the privacy screen but did not use it because I did not think the screen brightness is that offensive.As for video recording in stealth mode, it performs as described and does its job.  Having some ambient light helped.  Audio is amazingly loud too.

Reviews.Title: Good product except for instructions
Reviews.Author: gkspk
Reviews.Content: The product is great and is as advertised. A small inconspicuous clock that records any video and audio when there is movement. The one big improvement this product can use is a much better, detailed, and readable instruction booklet. The booklet is tiny with miniscule print and does not explain directions of usage very well. I had to fiddle around with the clock camera quite a bit to understand the basic operations. Then, when trying to decipher the different buttons and options and what each mean in a more detailed manner, I was clueless and left it as is. Later when trying to operate the camera, I just started pushing everything I can think of and became frustrated numerous times. I came very close to returning it, but needed a device now that did the basics and worked ok for the time being so I kept it.

Reviews.Title: Handy gadget!
Reviews.Author: Joanne M. Friedman "Schoolmarm"
Reviews.Content: I'll admit to being skeptical at the outset.  This isn't my first prom, and I've wound up with a pile of useless devices as a result.  But this little number is cute, functional, pretty much invisible, and the playback on the tiny screen is remarkably clear and hi-def even when the camera is set to lo-def.  My only issue is that scrolling through the accumulated videos is a little tedious.  I'm sure there's a setting for that; I just haven't discovered it yet.I'd recommend this to anyone who needs to run surveillance on a small-to-medium (my barn tack room is 10'x 20', and this will cover a far larger space as even the space outside the door is in focus in the vids).  It's got a lot of functions packed into a small unit.  Read the directions.  Really read them.  You'll be surprised.  And the price...well, it's worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: RoyHobbs
Reviews.Content: This is a great recording device.Right now it sits on top of my refrigerator aimed at the doorway to the living room recording in a constant loop as a type of security camera.I haven't used it in a hotel room but will test this within a week and post the results.As described, it's unobtrusive as it records and I'm guessing that if you ever were robbed it looks cheap enough to be overlooked and left behind by whomever is robbing you. That makes a pretty good, inexpensive, and mobile security cam. I can see it used primarily in your home but useful if you suspect someone is going into your office when you're not there or record what goes on in your hotel room when you're not there.The directions are good but, by far, the best way to get familiar with this camera is to watch the YouTube video several times and especially as you set it up and that's online at youtube.com/watch?v=ZPqF25zfC5kIt feels solid and the buttons on top are substantial, it will probably last awhile and if it doesn't I'll post.The menus are well thought out and the buttons are single-function dedicated i.e. you're not asked to guess what mode you're in and press a button several times to change the function of that particular button. So it's not challenging to move around the menus of this camera.The recommended 32G SDHC class 10 is a must but you'll probably want to order a longer 6' or even 10' power cord as the one foot cord which comes with it is a little short.No complaints, nice camera.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier....
Reviews.Author: Pattie Ross
Reviews.Content: For such a small device I was surprised at how many functions it has and how well it works. My only complaint is that I didn't order two of them. Picture is clear ... device is fully functional and easy to set up ...In less than a few minutes I was checking the 1st capture. The manual may be small but you can read it elsewhere and it worked just like the manual says... Thankx for the piece of mind.  A+++++

Reviews.Title: So much more than expected
Reviews.Author: SkipSpring
Reviews.Content: I saw the cheaper options but believe you pay for what you get. This item is well made and performs flawlessly. The customer support is unmatched and goes well beyond anything you might expect. I wish I had this sort of experience every time I shopped online

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Frostbeyet "Thermal"
Reviews.Content: Product is excellent, instructions was clear. and the video is exactly what it said it would be. I am going to order another one very soon.Frost...out

Reviews.Title: No Motion Detector Function
Reviews.Author: J. Outland
Reviews.Content: The instructions suffer from translation problems and are very difficult to understand.  In addition, the recording function is either on or off; there is no motion detector to start and stop recording, making it basically useless for me.  I don't understand what the manufacturers were thinking when they designed this.

Reviews.Title: Pretty great device
Reviews.Author: D. KULICK
Reviews.Content: Very good image quality although I haven't tried the low light setting yet. No motion detection which was sort of a surprise for a spy camera, but the fact that you can leave it plugged in and can use a big (32 gb or maybe larger MicroSD) gives you an awful lot of hours to record. And it can loop, deleting older videos as necessary if you set it that way. It is fairly tricky to learn, with a tiny instruction booklet, but the seller has an online video and a PDF of a blown up copy of the manual so that's very helpful. These products, at least cheaper ones, are often impossible to figure out from the broken English instructions. This one is not difficult.As for cons, it will only display 24 hr time; no AM/PM setting. The base has a very bright blue light which is annoying but is easily hidden by a piece of electrical tape and it actually looks good that way. I ran into an audio issue. Quicktime on XP, at least on my machine, produced a screeching audio track. But any other playback application (VLC or Nero Showtime) worked fine.Summary is that it is a very solid device, nice looking, and works well.

Reviews.Title: cautious of reviews
Reviews.Author: lew
Reviews.Content: I have always been cautious of 'customer' reviews on the internet. I always worry that its just someone working for the company that tries to make their product sound good. This is actually the first product I cared enough to leave a review of my own.With that being said i must say that this product is even better than advertised. Its not some cheap piece of flimsy plastic junk. its a quality made product worth its price. It does exactly what its supposed to and does a great job of it. The menu is very user friendly and easy to use, the night vision is ACTUAL night vision, the sound is amazing even from its compact size. This was an amazing find for use as a nanny cam. It was shipped in a matter of and hour and a half and arrived days before I expected it even according to amazon.Pros: true night vision  excellent sound  quality construction  easy to use  quick deliveryCons: short cord  only military time setting

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service!!!
Reviews.Author: CJ Dorman
Reviews.Content: I wish I could expound on how wonderful the camera is (and it does seem to be), but we purchased it to catch a thief ~ literally.  Before we had a chance to set it up, another neighbor caught the scumbag in the act.  But, what I can attest to is the integrity of this seller.  The product, once ordered, was immediately responded to and then sent out in a very timely manner.  Great instructions and product support.  The seller includes his name and a way to contact him personally.  Wow!!!!As mentioned above, we had a very specific reason to buy the camera and once that was resolved, I asked to send it back.  Again, without hesitation or problem, a return was issued.We are all familiar with the ways of Internet purchasing and most don't involve personal contact....may I just say that as disconnected as the process seems, this gentleman makes it honest, genuine, and as close to "home" as the Internet can.I wholeheartedly endorse purchasing from this seller!!!!

Reviews.Title: Many uses in one small unit it is awesome
Reviews.Author: Bobbie Kirby
Reviews.Content: I love this product that I bought two more. I thought one might be great gift. I found that it does so many things plus you could take it traveling it is compact. If you are into paranormal investigations great product to use because of long life battery and video recording. Compact to take on paranormal investigations. Want to have security when you leave your home this is great thing to have because it is small and discreet. Many are putting cameras in they're home this is just more discreet.

Reviews.Title: BUY it from Onlineenterprises888! I had to return original order from a diff. seller
Reviews.Author: bella
Reviews.Content: So this is a great "nanny cam" and I originally purchased it from a different amazon prime seller. The unit would freeze multiple times, which is not good for security purposes among being non-functional as a clock itself… Also, it would over-heat and would be hot to the touch. The instructions are small and the original unit I got had the outer casing attached improperly, making it almost impossible to remove the SD card (I had to open and re-assemble the unit to get the micro sd card out - insane!). So after the freezing instances were becoming more frequent, I decided to return the unit and order another one from Onlineenterprises888 b/c he's been the one answering all of the questions in the comments, as well as personally sending me larger version of the instructions for my original unit (which was NOT purchased from him). Due to the great customer service I received from him regarding my questions about a unit that was not purchased from him, I felt confident enough to order a replacement from him. First of all, this unit LOOKS newer, the buttons are MUCH easier to press (it was almost impossible on my first unit to quickly work through the menu and settings, even after I re-assembled the outer casing after the sd card fiasco). Also, the software seems to be newer and the recordings themselves are much clearer. I am hoping there are no freezing or overheating issues with this new unit, and the physical differences themselves show this unit to be far superior to the previous one. It seems other sellers are selling other or possibly refurbished models, unfortunately. I also can really appreciate a seller who is so quick to respond to any and all questions about a product that was ordered from other sellers. Also, SUPER fast shipping, even with prime, it took 1 day instead of two!I will be sure to update if there are any issues, but I really don't think there will be based upon the differences in quality mentioned above. Feel free to comment with any questions, this is a worthy investment and the best of its kind within the under $500 category.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Pros:1. Covert functionality/menus are hidden2. Records continuously (no need to recharge because it plugs in to the wall), but can also record about 2 hours of video on the included battery.3. Sturdy with decent quality video4. Is also a portable multimedia machine that plays video, mp3, and image filesCons:1. Not motion activated2. Makes no effort to hide memory card. Someone can pull out the memory card and view the hidden videos/content on a different device (but would not be able to view the hidden content on the device itself, unless they knew the get to the secret menu).3. Records audio only or video + audio, but does not give option to record video only4. Clock only displays military time

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE- SAVE YOUR MONEY & TIME, TERRIBLE INSTRUCTIONS & NO TECH SERVICE!
Reviews.Author: PAMELA EVANS
Reviews.Content: Even after reading the reviews I still ordered 2 of these - very bad move! The instructions you get are micro print & basically tell you functions not how to set it up. If you take the time & it will take a lot of time to call the "Support Telephone" number on the side of the box you will hold for about 30-40 minutes before you get an "English speaking" agent that is located in India - I know this because I asked where they were located, the side of the box boost Houston Texas - I didn't know they had a Houston Texas in India. I could pick out about every 3rd word he was saying & the just of what he said was they do not offer any tech support for this product - they just sell it!!! If you are lucky enough to get it to work I'm sure for the money it works fine but good luck with getting it to set up. There are other products out there that are much better & easier to set up - don't waste your time or money on this one! I would not have gave it one star but you have to in order to rate it!!!

Reviews.Title: Spy Cam - Held Up In Court!
Reviews.Author: Kathy D
Reviews.Content: I haven't hooked this Spy Cam up yet.  I bought it on the basis of one reviewer, who said her audio alone stood up in a Florida courtroom and was accepted by the judge.  I contacted the seller, who answered my questions.  I'm extremely happy with the purchase of this camera based on the Florida's court decision for the owner of the Spy Cam, and the willingness of the seller to help me and answer all my questions.  If you are uncomfortable, or uneasy or feel someone is entering your home and can't prove it, read all the reviews, and then buy this camera.  I know this camera will suit your needs.  It is extremely well priced for it's performance.I was right in buying this camera.  My fears were confirmed when a locksmith told me the stripping around my door had been cut and my lock had been popped and someone was entering my home when I was not there.  I had a new lock put on my apartment door immediately.  If I had set the Spy Cam up right away, I would have proof positive of the person who entered my home.  Don't delay like I did.  Set up your Spy Cam right away and get your proof!

Reviews.Title: If you need a hidden camera, this one is perfect for you.
Reviews.Author: Mario Juan Suriel Garcia
Reviews.Content: This mini clock was a great purchase for me. I came looking for a camera that would keep an eye on my bedroom when i'm gone. God knows how many little things go missing, (spare change, rings, watches, necklace etc ), this item works well. its a "set-and-forget" machine, and when the time comes you can have a footage of what happened.Now i gave it 4 stars for a lot of little reasons, and are basically what other people wrote on other reviews, i spend my time reading reviews so ill summarize it for you guys.1) wall charger : is white with a red led light that turns on when plugged in the wall. This is completely absurd, you are trying to get attention away from the mini clock, not towards. The wall charger is not very energy efficient as well. i replaced it immediately, you should do so as well.2) Length of the USB cord : its also white and is only 2 foot long. It works "well" if the clock is in a night stand beside the bed with a plug right behind it. if not,your best bet is to look for an old cell phone charger, and use the usb cable only when connecting to the PC.3) Controls and quick start guide : Even if Nick ( salesperson ) has bent-over backwards explaining how to properly use all the features of this machine, to the extent to even translate the Chinese version of the manual and have it in a pdf file, still does not change the fact that the controls are not very intuitive. Eventually you'll learn everything you need to make it work.4) Radio : This feature is listed in the machine, and you can select it. yet all you hear is static. Reason behind why, is probably because it needs an antenna, and it uses the earphones that it brings as an antenna, but if it got such great speakers why not include a retractable antenna is anyone guess.  I haven't found a way to make the radio work. but since that not the reason why i bought it, I'm not too upset about it.5) Field of vision and sound quality : You've probably seen nick's videos on YouTube and if you haven't you should do that now. The field of vision on this device is pretty narrow, specially when in totally dark environments. My suggestion is to point towards a door as people will be seen coming in and out of it and you'll get a better image of whom you are dealing with. Sound quality is superb, absolutely no complains there, it doesn't have noise canceling mic, but for the price, the sound cannot be better. for audiophile it may be terrible and full of noise, but for a regular person, you can hear crystal clear a conversation taking place in that room A+6) Packaging and product construction : This is where this machine shines. The product itself is very sturdy for its size, it fit in the palm of your hands, yet its a little bulky and pretty well made. Hands down, you can probably drop it a few times and won't make a dent, yet i don't recommend it, as it got an LED screen.In spite of all those pesky things, this clock/hidden camera works very well, and most people won't look at it twice even if you have a bunch of them spread out the house.i took one star cause they need to change a little bit , improve the cable, charger quality, control and quick start guide. other than that (points 1-4) is a flawless design.

Reviews.Title: Happy!
Reviews.Author: charizma
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a nanny cam, just want to make sure that babysitters are giving my child the best care, although, I know that they are the nicest and trusted people around here for babysitters.  I just want to try this product and check on what is really going on in the house when my hubby and I are not around.  The first item that came was defective and I was really disappointed, screen keeps freezing and buttons are not working anymore when it freeze up. I need to remove the battery just to back to main menu.  So, I decided to order another one and return the defective item.  The second one came today and tried it.  It was perfect this time and I am happy with the purchase.  I recommend this product but check right away if it's defective or not

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed for Such a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Cindie
Reviews.Content: I was initially hesitant to buy one of these until I saw  a recent news story where a home invader was caught because of nanny cam video. It was smaller than I thought but it is very discreet. Once you get the hang of the buttons and scrolling through the menus it's pretty easy to operate. I was very impressed with both the video and audio quality. I wanted to get one that was motion activated but those models were ridiculously priced. It records in "chunks" of time which you get to set. I would definitely recommend it. We just bought a second one.

Reviews.Title: All you need in a spy cam and more
Reviews.Author: Mike Dunn "portrait"
Reviews.Content: Very nice product. I used this to catch a thief and I did. The camera works perfectly, you can set your resolution, higher uses more storage space of course. I use low and 16GB and it can record up to 4 days. Easy to hook up to a computer and down load or watch from camera. I love the file partitions for each half hour so I only have to save what I need to my computer. The cord is short but I use a USB extension cord to hook to power for continues mode. The clock screen is way too bright for bedside clock but as someone else suggested you can buy a screen cover, same as for a smart phone. I highly recommend this product. I think if it had a alarm clock feature I would have replaced my bedside alarm clock with it. I'm going to budget buying more for my home office.

Reviews.Title: IT WORKED TO PERFECTION!!!!
Reviews.Author: M. L. smith
Reviews.Content: It served its purpose quite well ....the video image is good at night especially with soft background lighting....i am now single , ridding of a worthless parasitic girlfriend....if you have doubts....buy the camera and either prove or dismiss them :)

Reviews.Title: Top Secret Spy Camera Mini Clock Radio Hidden DVR
Reviews.Author: William W. Weikel Jr.
Reviews.Content: I've only had this product for a day or and thus far I am very happy with what this very small unit does. I only bought it to record any intruders if a breakin occurs at our home and for this it should be very capable. I'll update the rating if this unit holds up for at least a year and doesn't have any major problems. I'd recommend putting the disk in a computer and printing out directions that are large enough to read as the booklet that comes with it is worthless . Also onlineenterprises888 is the company to buy from as they will provide a more detailed written instructions plus they have a youtube video to pick up pointers. Finally make sure you know how to get into and out of a recording session correctly as pushing too many buttons can lock up the unit and then you'll have a time of geting it back to start. Overall it may be a four and maybe a five but time will tell if it's durable. It is a sweet little device that video quality is great, just set record in continue mode and review if a breakin or if using it to catch a thief or child abuser. Still playing with very low light settings also.  Been looking a long time and this is a great unit for the money.UPDATE of REVIEW was that after four months of use the camera/ video recording portion of the device is not functioning so this may wind up to be an expensive piece of junk. Trying to see if CameraTec had a 12 month warranty but can't seem to contact them thorough Amazon as of yet to get a replacement. Turned it on any time I left the house and was recording audio/video until a day ago so four months of use is not worth $80.

Reviews.Title: Works!!
Reviews.Author: Charnell Temple "LadyFlyer"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  I caught my boyfriend cheating with this thing.  And I was just trying to see if my daughter was snooping in my room!

Reviews.Title: Bad Batteries
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Blais "MJB"
Reviews.Content: I have hade this plugged in for a month and just unplugged it and the battery is dead. It should last more than a day in clock mode. The owners manuel is tiny but can be printed off a small disc. and now that I have discovered the problem it is no longer returnable and where do I get a good battery

Reviews.Title: Works very well
Reviews.Author: BB7
Reviews.Content: I have a relative in an assisted living facility.  His money kept disappearing from his wallet.  After only a few days we caught the thief. The device is compact and works very well.  The video is actually pretty good as well.  This was a good investment. The programming and set-up could be just a little easier but with a little patience it wasn't too bad.

Reviews.Title: Seems like a great buy
Reviews.Author: J teacher
Reviews.Content: My techie son watched the you tube video and showed me how to use it. He just googled the brand and model. I really like it. I bought two. You may have to buy a longer USB cord to plug in the power because the cord is only about 12 inches long. It says it runs for 31 days but the video says the 32G mini card only records a few days I'm high def. so we are going to try regular recording for our 4 day trip. Post results later

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't buy this again.
Reviews.Author: Brad bechtel
Reviews.Content: Not at all what they claim. Very hard to operate, and if anyone looks at it you can tell its a recording device. I could of got this quality from one that cost half the price.

Reviews.Title: Great little security camera!
Reviews.Author: g
Reviews.Content: This camera is definitely a keeper. The user manual is a little help but it isn't that tough to figure out how to use it. Does not look at all like a camera and the security cam menu is not apparent, the picture quality is between good and very good. I just got it and have not figured out all the functions but learning to record was pretty easy, you can take the memory card out of the camera and put it in a laptop and view the recording very easy. Unless you need a full month of recording at a time a smaller memory card will save a few bucks, I bought a 16GB memory and that is more than enough--it takes about 1 GB per day of recording.  I am not easily impressed but this one passes with flying colors! The clock and MP3/MP4 players make it look like an innocent little device. If you need to document anything discretely I recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: didn't work
Reviews.Author: Jessica rockwell
Reviews.Content: sent this as a gift to my parents. by the time i got to visit them and check it out, i realized it wasn't working and it was past the date of return. stuck with a defective product that doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Failed to Power Up
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: Failed to power up but after watching a YouTube video of how well it appears to work, I am going to try to order another one since it does qualify for free shipping. Unfortunately, Amazon does not offer replacement and instead offers refund. Returning the lemon though was made easy by Amazon and for that I'm appreciative. Keeping my fingers crossed that the next one is actually all it appears to be. At this point my only other complaint is the tiny instruction booklet. Had to get out the readers and even then it was difficult. Thank goodness for YouTube.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Woody K Hess
