Reviews.Content: Everything was as described, received as promised, and is very simple to operate once you enlarge the directions so you can read them.  Have seen other reviews that said the seller had that available, but I just enlarged myself.  Did not by for the "Spy" aspect of the device, but rather as a sleep monitor for myself, to try and discover why the hell I'm tired every day, and it delivered the goods on that.  Found that I was getting up at all times of the night(not remembering at all) and tossed and turned through the whole sleep cycle.  Showed the results to my Doctor, and with his help have modified some of my lifestyle habits, and a little medication.  Am now waking refreshed and ready to go.  For the price, this was much cheaper than a sleep clinic, and all the expenses and time that would have went with that. I can see that the device would be quite effective for monitoring your home or business without raising any suspicion as it does look just like a digital clock.  Guess I will use it now for checking out what's stealing all my grapes from the vine!!  LOL Human or critter??Not movie quality, but definitely good enough to see what's going on.  Sound is also quite good for such a small device.  Only drawback I see is that it only displays in military time, which seems like kind of a silly flaw considering all the other functions it can do. Well worth what I paid for the application that it was used for, probably saved me 1000's in medical bills to find out the same information.

Reviews.Title: it works ok
Reviews.Author: Rob Harris
Reviews.Content: It works, but it is a little hard to get setup because everything you put on the computer to download is not in english.  Once you get through the guessing part of downloading it, it is in english.  The function's are ok one you figure it out on your own because the instruction are a little difficult to understand.  I have had problems with it's connection with the usb cable, so I had to purchase a SD card adaptor for my computer.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected!!!
Reviews.Author: CG
Reviews.Content: This little camera is a great! I bought it to catch a thief, but it could be used for anything. It is very easy to set up and use. The picture is very clear and the sound is good. Nobody would ever think that this little clock radio is recording them.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The Camera is everything you would expect. The seller sent the item right on time and actually sent me an email with instructions on how to use it before I even received the item. When I had questions I asked by email and their responses were quickly returned and helpful reminding me that they wanted me to be 100% satisfied. And I am! The picture and sound have great quality and once you read the instructions its really very easy to use. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a quality spy-cam at a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Mini Spy Camera
Reviews.Author: Dinaa3
Reviews.Content: I just received my mini spy camera and its awesome. Thanks for the email with the instructions I could download and read in larger print. Very easy to understand and program.

Reviews.Title: Great product!!
Reviews.Author: Victorious
Reviews.Content: This is a great product works as described. Watch the video tutorial if you want before you buy it. It is easy to use. Sound quality for audio ( mp3) are phenomenal!! Covert nature is great. No complaints here.

Reviews.Title: Great product and seller
Reviews.Author: A. Korman "amryk"
Reviews.Content: This item is great. The seller gives you extra help, since the directions included in the box are small print and not easy to follow (for me, anyway).

Reviews.Title: TOP Secret Spy Camera Mini Clock Radio Hidden DVR
Reviews.Author: Yvonne
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I’d wanted to write a review before I received an item, but because of work load I couldn’t find the time.From the moment I placed the order with onlineenterprises888 the customer service was excellent, they sent me all the information about the above product even a YouTube video to make it easier if you didn’t want to read the instructions, the delivery was quick, the day after the items arrived I received another e-mail, check everything was ok and that if I needed help in any way to contact them, you won’t need to as the YouTube video is great for the lazy of us that can’t be bother to read the instructions.The camera for such a tidy little package does great recordings good quality picture with sound, runs on a continues loop which will record over 24hrs with the SanDisk 32GB memory card you can buy with it. When recording you can also use the other functions I keep it on clock display and no one would know it’s recording. The only thing I would have liked would be a motion sensor, but that would have cost a lot more, I do believe the company sells them with this option; it’s a good piece of equipment at a great price. I do not work for the company nor have used them before, the reason I’m giving such a good review is that I was so pleased with the customer care before and after which is quite rare out there. I would use them again.

Reviews.Title: excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: Chung Hien Luong
Reviews.Content: I bought one last couple weeks ago, unfortunately it seemed to work incorrectly. I contact to the dealer and got the response  immediately. After returning the failure product I got the new one and now it works well. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Works great. I was amazed on how good the picture quality is.I am using a 16gb card. it records about 2 days.Nobody can tell its a spy camera but if they take the unit and plug it into a PC all the hidden files are easily found.My only complaint is the power cord is very short.

Reviews.Title: just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: kathy ellis
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly what I was looking for.  I could not pull up the disc on my computer hut was able to Google the camera name and had all the instructions there. I would recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: A Tiny answer to hidden cameras problems.
Reviews.Author: denise
Reviews.Content: This has been a very pleasing purchase.  It more than adequately fills my needs and it does not give away its hidden functions.  I only have a problem with tuning into stations or having presets.  If there is a way to set them then I may not be smart enough to understand the directions or the instructions are definitely lacking in this regard.  But beyond that, great product

Reviews.Title: Woefully inadequate instructions.
Reviews.Author: Russ Nuspliger
Reviews.Content: Instructions were obviously written by someone who either didn't know how it worked, or wanted every purchaser to go insane trying to figure it out themselves.  Also possible the writer had a problem with the English Language.  Had to play with it for over an hour, and still don't fully understand all of it's capabilities.  What I have figured out so far, it would seem to work as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Awesomely sneaky!
Reviews.Author: T. Kaye "Amazon is my hero!"
Reviews.Content: Once I figured out how to use it correctly I can't imagine not having it around.  Well worth the money!!

Reviews.Title: did not work
Reviews.Author: mark l friedlaender
Reviews.Content: trying to set it up camera and clock froze up.it is a pain to set up.sent it back right away

Reviews.Title: Night Camera stopped working
Reviews.Author: Post Pregnancy
Reviews.Content: It really is quite good. Watch the video on youtube and skip the printed directions (for operating the "spy" features). However, my night camera, which was excellent when I first bought it, stopped working two days after purchase. Defeats the purpose at bit. It's not a setting thing-- it's just broken. Would also be nice if it had a motion detector. Gets very laborious going through all those clips. Make sure you keep it plugged in as the battery dies quickly. Also, the charger always shines a bright red light, which I feel draws a lot of attention to the clock. I would buy again. I would recommend, despite the camera issues-- which from other reviews appear to be bad luck on my end.

Reviews.Title: Thank you Nick at onlineenterprises888
Reviews.Author: hrshfjsw
Reviews.Content: I was considering several different DVI cameras before purchasing this product.When I saw good reviews about onlineenterprises888, I send him e-mail inquiring which DVR he would recommend.  He responded quickly with information and I selected this DVI.The camera produces great quality videos with sound, runs on a continues loop which will record over 24hrs. I am over all happy with this product.  However, the display had white stripes after a week.  I contacted the seller onlineenterprises888, he replaced immediately.  After few months, the display developed a problem again.  Onlineenterprises888 helped me again to replace the DVR.  I am very grateful.  Thanks, Nick.  I thinks the device is very sensitive with movement or shocks. So handle it with care.

Reviews.Title: That Will Do
Reviews.Author: BrownSugarBear
Reviews.Content: The only draw back I can see is the size, I was expecting something bigger. It looks like a little desk clock, so would be great for an office. Looking at it you don't think twice if it's a camera or not, so it will catch what you need.My friends call me Brown Sugar if I like something I say it's sweet, if I don't I say it's unsweet. This Mini Cam is Sweet lol.

Reviews.Title: So small and discrete!!!
Reviews.Author: Violeta Martinez
Reviews.Content: So I got it in the mail sooner than it stated, first off. It's so small I had no idea what it was haha but then I took it out and it said it on the box. The bad things first: it did not come with any instructions but, I did google/youtube it and the video was very helpful (the guy explained everything very detailed and he stayed on point), the plastic that covers the batter, one of the little prongs at the end broke (cheap plastic) and last the power cord could have been a little longer. Other than that it looks like it was used before so the price was just excessive. PROS: it works great!!! The video is awesome, night vision is awesome, the sound is awesome, honestly everything else is awesome. The controls are easy to learn which is always a good thing! ;D

Reviews.Title: Great camera, but one problem...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The video and sound is quite good, especially for 640x480.  But one of my buttons stopped working too well.  It doesn't click anymore when you press it, so to enter the camera mode I have to push down as hard as I possibly can and I'm sure this button will stop working sometime soon.

Reviews.Title: Conflicted
Reviews.Author: Brian Miller
Reviews.Content: I didn't try to return it or contact customer service so you're on your own with that.  However, i did get it working with a little troubleshooting.  Right off the bat, it blew the wall transformer it was packed in.  Tried several other transformers, turns out it was the battery.  Works okay as long as the battery isn't installed.  This thing has some nice features, like continuous loop recording, functional cock, radio, and alarm, and its nice and covert which I like.  If all those features worked a little better this thing would be great.  And maybe, in the next version, hide the SSD slot a little better?  It's pretty obvious.

Reviews.Title: Worked for a bit, then quit working
Reviews.Author: ChromeDome
Reviews.Content: When this thing DID work, it was phenomenal. Easy to set up, easy to use, and accentuated by youtube videos explaining the use. For the first 2 days, I got some good footage.Then, it quit working. The record feature wouldn't shut off and it became "stuck" in record mode, the buttons quit working, and I had to let the battery die to reset the unit. I tried one last time after powering it up, but the same results occurred.Summary - maybe I got a lemon. If it works as intended, this is a wonderful device. Let's see how good the return policy is...

Reviews.Title: Small super small and cheaply built.
Reviews.Author: K Barnett
Reviews.Content: Small super small and cheaply built. It is kind of cool, but so small and for the what it cost I was disappointed. The navigation is challenging and also in English and Chinese so be careful, The Camera though is not bad. It is a nice gizmo, but for the money get something else is what I decided to do.

Reviews.Title: Lost the Money, not worth for the money
Reviews.Author: Sree
Reviews.Content: I used this only a couple of time to record the video as a baby monitor. The record option stopped working the third time when i tried and just after the return by date is passed. The recoding devise used to create some un-openable files along with video files the last time i recorded. I bought a new SD card thinking that the fault is on SD card. Lost the money on that too as the problem wasn't with SD card.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Larry Ewoldt "Larry"
Reviews.Content: I bought this in October of 2013. I had to find a video online to learn how to operate it first of all. Then about a month ago the battery swelled up and stopped working. I plugged the unit in and now there was a stripe running down the center of the display.NOT WORTH THE MONEY

Reviews.Title: Very bad camera
Reviews.Author: Franklin
Reviews.Content: Very bad product i recive my camera and as soon i try to use it the camera record 10 seconds and after that the image get totally black.....i get in contact with amazon costumer service and i get my refund inmidiately..

Reviews.Title: Awesome and as promissed
Reviews.Author: Christopher P
Reviews.Content: Good quality product so far.  No issues and works as promised from seller.  I would recommend this product to anyone.  Doesn't give the best night record but everything else is great

Reviews.Title: Only one problem...
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: (UPDATE BELOW!)SELLER, PLEASE HELP:Everything about it is great except for one thing. It's a problem I've simply ignored for the last 9 months without complaining because it still did the job, but recently I started caring when I noticed in other example videos they didn't have the same issue.The problem is, the colors are screwed up. For example, when recording a person, the hair is almost always a pinkish blue (regardless of their actual hair color). The clothing is usually a pinkish blue when it's not that color at all in real life. Basically, the video is crystal clear, but the colors are jacked up, and after hours of playing with and experimenting with the settings, it's stayed the same with no success at fixing it. I would have contacted the seller, Nick, directly instead of writing this review, but I could find NO way to contact the seller since I guess after 9 months it's too late. But it says in the picture that I get a 1 year warranty, so Nick, any help?UPDATE: I have never used it in natural or white light until just now. I use it primarily in yellow-lighted areas (as most houses and lamps use). But when I tried it under natural light from outside (and white light inside), it worked just fine and all the colors were normal. It's only under yellow light that the colors are off, but I'm bumping back to four stars because it's still a great product despite the yellow light issue. Although, Nick, is there any way to fix this?

Reviews.Title: Absolute Junk
Reviews.Author: Bruce Miller
Reviews.Content: Battery never held a charge. When I plugged it in I got 2 white bars runningthrough the screen and the menus were unresponsive.I tried to contact the seller and got no response.I was totally ripped off.

Reviews.Title: works good
Reviews.Author: 67 wanna B
Reviews.Content: I wish it was a little bigger so when I am in the hotel I can also use it as a clock placed on the desk. I don't want it next to the bed but watching the staff while they are in my room.  I have had stuff taken from the suitcase and that is nerve wracking.  In the home having it look like a smoke detector would be good.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after first couple of hours
Reviews.Author: Corkky
Reviews.Content: I don't know why so many here have trouble understanding how to use this. I think the menu system on it is easy and intuitive. I had no trouble setting it up to record, and viewing the recordings the first few times as I was testing it (short recordings only a few minutes long).It seemed to work perfectly fine, BUT after I used it to record for a few hours and then I picked it up to view the recordings the screen just went all white (white lit screen). It would not shut off even with the OFF button.  I had to remove the battery and reinsert it.  After reinserting the first time everything came back up ok, and I thought "well ok, it rebooted and everything is fine now"  ... so I set it up to record again and left it recording for about 2 hours or so.  Came back to look at the recordings clicked the MENU button and it went into 'white screen' mode again.  Again I took the battery out and reinserted but THIS TIME all I get now when I turn it ON is 3 flashes of light on the screen and then NOTHING... all black screen. Nothing I do seems to get it to work again.  Something is definitely defective with the unit I got. I ended up having to return it.  Shame, it seemed to work fine but then POOF!! :-(

Reviews.Title: Worked when new, too frustrating
Reviews.Author: J. L. Nelson
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed in this hidden camera.  Instructions are terrible, but there is a helpful YouTube video.After a few weeks the display became disrupted with vertical white bands which made it difficult to set the time on it, but did not affect the video. It's extremely sensitive and required almost daily resetting of the time - it would be unresponsive (couldn't get into the menu, or out if I was in the menu) and then I had to remove the battery so it would reset, then had to change the date and time again.Currently it is not working at all after barely 6 months. Possibly the battery is dead, even though the unit has been plugged in the whole time I have had it

Reviews.Title: Would have liked it if it was not defective.
Reviews.Author: Pedro
Reviews.Content: Read all the reviews on this and what appeared to be the same camera from other suppliers.  The consensus seemed to be that it was a real good deal if it worked.  Thought I'd take the chance, knowing that Amazon has a very good return policy.  Well - mine did not work.  The time display did not update.  When in the menus, you could see it updating, but the display was stuck at 12:00.  When turning the DVR on, the display (that should have been showing the time) only showed the image that was being recorded.  Could not shut it off.  Even tried turning the power switch off.  Still did not shut off.  Had to remove the battery.  All of these issues were identified in other reviews.  But I have a friend with one of these cameras and his works great.  I may take another chance on it only because the competition does not seem any better for reviews.  Just not much out there for good quality.  Looked all the way up into the $500 range.

Reviews.Title: mostly good but a few pet peeves
Reviews.Author: csctnmrm
Reviews.Content: Pros -The camera works well for what I need.  It seems very durable and looks good.  I love that you can turn it on and forget about it.  No need to replace batteries (I have it plugged in so there's always power). Clear images and easy to download files to my computer.  I bought mine from Nick (onlineenterprises888) in case I have tech issues.  I haven't had any yet but he seems VERY helpful.Cons -I work in a big city (just over 1 million people) and the radio only picks up THREE stations.  The ones that do come in aren't clear.  Part of why I bought this one is so I could use it as a radio at my desk. The 18 inch USB cable (& charger) is too short to set on a desk and plug into a wall outlet directly below.  If you have MP3 files or the radio turned on then the clock isn't visible, it goes black.

Reviews.Title: Never buy this again
Reviews.Author: Wayne Retired
Reviews.Content: I would have given a TINY star if there was such a thing.There are so many things wrong with this.  The instructions were extremely difficult to follow & some were wrong or misleading.  I found out how to access the private video from trial & error.  The entire unit finally just stopped working.  Never could get the radio setup or tuned in to the local stations, even after a dozen tries.The video did not tape in total darkness. "Beautiful video in low light even without IR or use in TOTAL DARKNESS".  I let it record in my garage while I went out for over two hours and the video was clear when the door was opened, somewhat bright due the sun and made it fuzzy.  When I got back and ran the video, after having some trouble following the instructions, the recording did not show anything without the lights on.  I should have been able to see my garage door "..in TOTAL DARKNESS.." but NOPE!  I could not see anything.  I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS FOR ANY USE.

Reviews.Title: Review...with some problems
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: I was pretty excited when I saw this product and read all the reviews.  Some had minor problems but most seemed satisfied so I ordered one.  I'll start with the pros.The exterior quality of the unit seems quite good and is nice looking.  The display is nice and sharp.  I didn't receive the large print instructions but I was able to figure everything out with minimal effort.  I purchased a 32G sd card and had all the settings done and recording within about 15 minutes.  The day light recording quality on High and 640X480 resolution is amazingly good and sharp.  I would guesstimate that at a distance of 8 feet that the width of the capture area is also about 8 feet.  For my use, I found this acceptable.  Again, this is under light conditions.  See cons for recording in the dark.  I like the fact that I can turn off the clock display while recording.  This makes it blend in easily as just some little gadget sitting on a desk or thrown in with a box of other electronics and doesn't draw attention to itself even as a clock, especially in a dark room.  If anyone were to ask, I could say it's a little MP3 player or powered speakers and nobody would think anything else about it.  Viewing the videos on my laptop is a breeze and was as expected.  Put the microSD into the adapter, plug it in and the window opens asking me what I want to do.  Select open folder to view files and everything is in the folder.  No problem.  I do wish the FPS was a little higher so that playback was smoother but it's  decent.  Audio recording is good quality.  I don't know about catching voices with background noises but I found it to be pretty much like normal hearing in a quiet room.  I would expect if you can hear and understand someone talking  over any background sounds from 12 feet away, that's what you'll hear on the recording.  I did hear some electronic interference that was not from anything present in the room but I had no problems understanding what was being said.  I haven't tested the audio at any longer distances than about 12 feet so I can't comment beyond that.Now for some cons and some problems that will cause me to return it.The only function outside of using it for video and audio recording that I tested was the FM radio function.  I live in a large metro area with MANY strong FM stations.  I couldn't pick up a single one.  NOT one!  I actually expected all the functions to work correctly as advertised, even if the main purpose is for discreet audio and video recording.Next is the EXTREMELY short 2 foot long power chord.  Unless you have an outlet within 2' of the unit, order or purchase a longer chord.  The chord is useless.  Along with the chord is the power supply that plugs into the wall.  It has a VERY bright red LED that causes the whole power supply to glow red and lights up a big area!  As I said, it's VERY bright!  Even if you turn off the display on the unit, with the power supply only 2 feet away, it is not discrete at all and will have everyone trying to figure out what the bright red light is in a dark room.  If I were to keep the unit, I would immediately go out and buy a power supply and longer chord.  This alone destroys the idea of it being discrete.No alarm clock.  When I was thinking about ordering it, I thought that it was strange to sell something that can operate as a clock/"radio" but doesn't have an alarm clock.  I went ahead and ordered it not fully thinking it through.  Here is the dilemma, If I travel with the wife, I can't justify plugging the thing in in a hotel room if I can't set an alarm on it.  She would be wondering what I need a clock for that doesn't have an alarm and I don't intend to tell her it's a video recorder.  If you set it in a bedroom with the clock display on, someone will try to set it as an alarm.  Who would buy and set out an LED clock that doesn't have an alarm function?  Again, makes no sense.  For some, it may not matter but it's something you might want to consider.The blue LED in the base.  Someone obviously did not think this one through.  If you have the clock display on, the blue LED in the base isn't a problem but what was the point of even putting one in there???  If you turn the clock display off, you still have this blue LED glowing that makes it obvious that the unit is powered up and draws attention to it in a dark room.  As others have suggested, you can cover it with tape or take the base off and pry the LED off the circuit board.  I don't know why I should even have to consider doing either of those things but if I kept the unit, that blue LED would go away, one way or another.For the cons listed up to this point, I would still keep the unit and simply make the changes and modifications I listed and overlook the alarm and radio issues.  I did buy it mainly for video and audio recording.  The reasons I have to return it are because two items are defective.The battery won't charge.  While I have read that the battery might only last a couple of hours, for most of my uses that would be acceptable but it won't charge at all.  If I left it plugged in in the same location all the time, it wouldn't matter but if you unplug it to move it, you lose all the clock settings which is also tied to the date/time stamp on the recordings.  That's a pain to have to reset it after I move it and I do want to use it from time to time on battery and with the clock display on.IR LED's.  I tested out the night recording mode in a room.  First with a lamp on and then in total darkness.  I set the LED's to  be on and Night Recording mode to on.  With the lamp on, the recording was grainy beyond about 8 feet.  Anything in a shadow was virtually invisible.  If I was fully exposed to the light, I could Irecognize my face up to the distance of the room, about 12 feet.  Not great but ok.  Next, total darkness.  The LED's do not cast light the full width or height of what the lens is capable of viewing.  I would say maybe more like 5 feet wide at the available 8 feet wide of the lens at a distance of 10 feet.  Beyond about 3 feet wide, the LED's don't cast enough light to make out much of anything.  This makes pointing the lens at exactly what you want to capture very precise or you won't see much of anything.  In my case, putting the camera no more than 5' away from the point I want to capture, at about the same level as the capture point and only getting a decent view of  about 3 feet high and 3 feet wide.  That is not going to work for me at all.  After reading the reviews and watching the sample video, I had to question the LEDS on my unit.  Using the camera on my phone, I looked at the front of the unit to see if the LEDs were in fact working properly.  They are on the left side of the unit and are grouped into three pairs, one pair above the next.  Sure enough, the pair in the middle are out.  It is very possible that with ALL of the LEDs working, there would be an improvement, but I have to question how much.  The main reason I share this is for others who may be wondering about the LEDs and not seeing well  or suddenly have a reduction in night viewing.  It may be your LEDs are not all working and it's easy to check them.I give total kudo's to the seller for his prompt responses and answering questions.  He seems very motivated and honest about his products and willing to help his customers.  I would give him and his business 5 stars.  However, I do wish that all the units were tested and checked before shipping.  Seeing that the LEDs and the battery wasn't charging would have been an easy catch.  Now I have to return the unit which will cost me money in the extra shipping I paid to receive the unit and the time to box it up and send it back for a refund.  I won't ask for an exchange because I am concerned the replacement unit might also have issues.  I have read reviews where a replacement unit also did not work properly.  I also have to question how well the unit will actually record in a dark environment even with all of the LEDs all working.  I'm going to explore other options.

Reviews.Title: Does what I wanted at a great price
Reviews.Author: Theresa
Reviews.Content: This may not me the most high tech hidden camera and I would have liked to be able to program it to turn on and off during certain times of the day, but, the beauty is it looks like a regular alarm clock, has good picture quality in daylight, good sound, and decent night time video. Between the directions and the developers youtube video instructions, I now find it easy to use. I  turn on when I leave the house, turn it off when I come home and with the time stamped video's, easily find the video's that I want to check out. Using a 32 gb card, I have more than enough space. Expect to pay a lot more for a programmable camera, which I did, and the video was worse than this one. (Of course that one was not sold on Amazon) :)

Reviews.Title: Sent it back
Reviews.Author: Lindley
Reviews.Content: I know that this is one of the cheapest cameras available, but for $80, I did expect just a little bit more than what I got. The quality obviously wasn't the best, and battery life was terrible. It just didn't do what I needed it to do, which was give me streaming access to the feed. It also had a screen defect. I returned this (which was quick and painless), spent an extra $20, and got a Lorax camera that has an app I can use on my Android phone. The quality and ease of use still isn't the greatest (the app has a ton of bugs) but I can keep an eye on my dog while I'm at work so for $100, that was definitely a much better value than the TOP Secret camera.

Reviews.Title: Could never get this to work
Reviews.Author: Yukon Jack
Reviews.Content: Lousy foreign directions, apparently zero "customer service," I could never get this thing to work (and I was a computer network manager). The price looked good...but not for something that doesn't work,and not when you cannot contact the vendor to get some assistance. Cheap junk, my personal opinion.

Reviews.Title: Not a good buy
Reviews.Author: Alexander Khorkov
Reviews.Content: Not user friendly product, wouldn't recommend.  Complicated set up, instructions are not clear, hard even to see,  such a small print. Well, you get what you pay for. Cheap and bad value

Reviews.Title: Clock screen malfunction!
Reviews.Author: Karen Rosa "krosa73"
Reviews.Content: If the screen of the clock worked, I would love this product. The screen has three vertical lines that appeared one day while I was scrolling through the menu. Hasn't gone away. So now it looks like a broken digital clock, which under normal circumstances would be discarded. But considering the price, and that the video functions well, I still use… though, not happily. The video comes out pretty well, though low-light video is grainy. The audio comes across also. Just that stupid screen malfunction.

Reviews.Title: All of a sudden stopped working.
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Sirney
Reviews.Content: This worked great for the first few months, but now every time I try to set it up in surveillance mode, it freezes and I have to remove the battery to fix it. I've re-formatted the SD card but to no avail. I would not recommend this device.

Reviews.Title: awesome for what it is
Reviews.Author: franny Robertson
Reviews.Content: this little cam may have some complex controls but its mostly just remembering how and what buttons to push love that the seller included simplified instructions for it since the manual is very tiny works great for in home security. not super high quality but it is suprizing how clear and sharp the picture is even in the dark audio is good to as long as there isn't to much background noise. works great if you want to keep an eye on certain spots in your house no one will even notice its there

Reviews.Title: Very poor product.
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Very poor product. Battery lasts about 1.5 hours. After a few days of use even the on/off button didn't work when I was trying to turn it off because none of the other buttons were working and I was hoping to reset it by turning it off and back on again. Very unclear instructions. Don't waste your money on this item!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: It doesn't really work well...you can not fast forward it...the images are all right...it is not easy to use...it is not for friendly users..

Reviews.Title: restaurant camera
Reviews.Author: Robin L. Simonson
Reviews.Content: bought this item for a restaurant. very easy to set up. worked great for what I purchased it for. would highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: wanda butler
Reviews.Content: Didn't work was useless .  Hard to program and can only record for a Hour ..battery life short and to small

Reviews.Title: Great gadget...highly recommended.
Reviews.Author: Asian87
Reviews.Content: If you want a nifty cam for a reasonable price, this is the device for you.  It was confusing to figure out at first almost to the point where I wanted to throw in the towel and return it.  Just go to the YouTube link provided on this item's page.  The instructions are phenomenal and after about a half hour with playing around with the buttons, it is easy to figure out what to do and how to do it.  Do not expect more from this camera than what it is.  The quality of the recordings are better with good lighting and it will be bad with hardly any lighting despite its night vision.  Radio does not work.  There are so many features to this device but like the radio, most are unnecessary and are worthless.  Focus on the cam and how to use it and you will enjoy this product for what it is worth.

Reviews.Title: Thank You!
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: My pakage came in faster then i expected. it's a wonderful product very easy to function. The only issue i'm having is when i try to few my videos in the cam, it says " NO FILES " maybe i have a wrong MICRO SD CARD, other then that the cam records very well, and clear.

Reviews.Title: It does what it says!!
Reviews.Author: CAF
Reviews.Content: It Works fine, the picture quality is good for the resolution, easy to use, reliable. Would recommend with no problem

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Reo
Reviews.Content: It only got 4 stars because the directions are very tiny and not good at explaining all the features easily. And I know this thing has volume (I think) but I can't figure out how to get it to work. Once you figure it out, the recording set up is easy and the picture is good for my purposes.

Reviews.Title: I like this and will look at the other spy cameras.
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: I like this little clock it is nice to set up in my office or the living room.  It keeps an eye on your house if you have visitors or kids if you don't know them very well.  I do know most of my visitors but better to be safe than sorry if you happen not to be homeThe only problem I have is it is a little confusing when setting it up and getting use to using it but once you learn which buttons to push, it is okay.  The "youtube" video helps a lot.I would buy another one as a gift for a friend of family member.

Reviews.Title: complicated directions
Reviews.Author: Val
Reviews.Content: This camera is very complicated to use. I thought it would be much easier to get in record mode and them play back. The actual recording night mode is god, but playback and such is VERY complicated. Even had my tech saavy son give it a try and he gave up.

Reviews.Title: I can't figure this thing out!
Reviews.Author: KnoxvilleRob
Reviews.Content: The instructions were a little complicated. I'm still trying to figure em out! All-in-all it looks like it will be a great little product, but I'll have to spend some serious time working on it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty neat!
Reviews.Author: nergnijieb
Reviews.Content: Well built product and functions as stated.Hard to read manual and requires many tries to make hidden functions work correctly.

Reviews.Title: Decent little device, has room for improvement though...
Reviews.Author: techguru79
Reviews.Content: Product is decent.  It records well, but the buttons on the device you have to press hard on to get them to respond sometimes.  The radio function doesnt work at all.  Bummer when you try to throw people off with having them think it can at least do that.  It can play music that you load though, so at least there is that.  The battery on this thing doesnt last that long, it drains rather quickly, so i have it with constant charging.  The motion detect recording works but it also goes off even when there is no motion going on.  After a day, i can find tons of videos of no activity that went off at different times, so not sure why.  So with that, i'd say its decent at best

Reviews.Title: Great non-HD Video at a Bargain Price
Reviews.Author: ronin
Reviews.Content: This product works great in high, low and no light.  It's no HD but it's quite sharp to my surprise.  It does not have any alarm features (disappointing) but nevertheless, a great product for the price.  It does not do wide screen like other models.  Record time on one charge is around 2 1/2 to 3 hours at highest resolution.

Reviews.Title: PRETTY DARN GOOD!
Reviews.Author: Michael Fleharty "Custom Builder"
Reviews.Content: Pretty darn good - - very surprised with the video quality; it's exceptional for such a small, inexpensive product.  You'd be surprised at what you can catch on camera - love that part.

Reviews.Title: It is OK
Reviews.Author: Win
Reviews.Content: It is OK. The instructions require a magnifier to read and the ability to interpret "rice box" English. I never got the radio to work. The video is crystal clear and the sound recording works if you can just figure out the instructions!

Reviews.Title: Great nanny cam
Reviews.Author: Janis Dinkel
Reviews.Content: This camera is great, it time stamps and breaks down the video in 30 minute increments.  It will video up to three days on a large (32) SD card before looping.  It picks up sound great and has a really good picture!!  Easy to use.  The only thing bad I could say is the directions that comes with it are super tiny!!  Great nanny cam and great price!

Reviews.Title: Not reliable
Reviews.Author: matthieu_m
Reviews.Content: I returned it after a week because it would stop recording, freeze and stop responding. The only way to reset it was to unplug it. Also it is very obvious that it is a recording device if you look at it. why did they put the camera near the screen? They should have put it on the side where people usually don't look at

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: Mary M.
Reviews.Content: works well. It came with pretty good instructions and I was able to use it right away. You do need to order a micro SDHC memory card for it. Occasionally, the device seem to freeze and I cannot turn it off or go to any menus but I found out that if I just remove the battery and the place it back in it restarts just fine. I think the freezing happened after it ran out of charge completely a couple of times and so now I leave it plugged in all day.

Reviews.Title: Not good.
Reviews.Author: E. Ng "E Mojo"
Reviews.Content: The recording picture is not clear, and the button is hard to press. I don't like it at all. I would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: KEVIN ANDERSON
Reviews.Content: good product and fast delivery, very well manufactured and build. i recommend it for every body, and i will order it again if i need another one.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Kendall
Reviews.Content: It worked out great....keep up the good work. I would like to know if it will take a 128gb memory card?

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised.  And customer service is top notch, if needed.  A+
Reviews.Author: Seth Holtzman
Reviews.Content: After researching various options and scouring the reviews of this item in particular, I sprung for it.  Glad I did.  Be aware that it is a small and limited device.  If you are expecting videocam quality, get a videocam.  But for what it does, it does well.  At one point, I had a problem with it freezing up, but a quick email exchange with the very helpful seller solved that problem quickly.  Apparently, there are conditions under which this device can overheat.  Removing and then reinstalling the battery was a quick fix.

Reviews.Title: is good, could be better
Reviews.Author: JOSE PERDOMO
Reviews.Content: the camera has good size, quiet but has a blue light that stays on all the time which makes it obvious.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: grandma
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent little camera. It is inconspicuous and works great. I put it to use in a room that should be off limits to my employees. Caught one red handed and am so thankful for this device. It's instructions are extremely small, but readable with a magnifying glass.

Reviews.Title: Dead battery
Reviews.Author: Ottakuthar
Reviews.Content: Received and returned to seller in one day due to dead battery. Radio and clock did not work properly and after charged for 6-8 hours, the battery was dead and I could not able to see any sign off display in the screen. Concept is great I would like to have this for myself but unfortunately the manufacturer to do lot of improvement on quality and overheating issue. The instruction manual is a joke and need to have magnifying glass to read.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy it
Reviews.Author: Mussio Mussi
Reviews.Content: Confusing operation, charger blew up in the first week, 3rd week stopped working, Did not worth time and money spent

Reviews.Title: Worthless camera
Reviews.Author: Diane "Diane"
Reviews.Content: I couldn't get this camera to work at all. The directions were worthless and so was the camera. Would not recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Not a good buy at all!
Reviews.Author: M. Medina
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item to utilize as a nanny cam. I had to return it do to the fact it froze on me. I recorded a few videos to see how it works and I was never able to review them. It took up memory space but in the device it stated there was no video. Also the lens and memory card is visible. It was a waste of time and money. Don't buy!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money!
Reviews.Author: david noble
Reviews.Content: This hidden camera does not work!  Does not play back on the clock screen. Does not record. Looks like a very cheap clock that you might find in a dollar store or gum ball machine. Maybe in one of those claw arcade machines. Tried reformatting the memory card but nothing changed. Buyer beware!  Worthless piece of c***!  Would give it no stars but doesn't give you an option. For those looking for an honest recent review of this product, here you go!

Reviews.Title: First bad review by me:(
Reviews.Author: Joseph W. Perrotta
Reviews.Content: Well the unit doesn't work.  I got authorization to return the item but was charged a restocking fee for a bad unit.  Really?  Where are you going to restock a defective unit?  Are you going to restock a defective unit to resell?  Please refrain, seller, from cutting and pasting your "very few of these are defective" non sense response.  I would stay clear of this.  Or go ahead and buy.  You just might get my restocked defective unit.  Then you can return it and get charged the restocking fee as well as return shipping charge.

Reviews.Title: review TOP secret spy camera
Reviews.Author: rene arets
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to anyone handy good looking and it fully covers the expectations against a very reasonable price.Dislike: The included USB wire is too short

Reviews.Title: Short Short Short
Reviews.Author: Tammi Vanzandt
Reviews.Content: The cables are so darn short that you can not plug spy cam anywhere!! I mean what is the point... the goal is to hide it, thus you would put the camera in an area that is not looked upon often.. you pretty much have to just leave this out in plain view and even thou it is hidden, it just looks awkward like something is up.

Reviews.Title: Super Small ver good audio and video quality
Reviews.Author: Carlos Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Excellent Spy camera. Very small, very good audio and video. The only detail is the cable charger is very short so you will need an extension to put it in a table. Also you cant hear music and record at the same time so if you are recording your nanny that its my case to see if she is really working and taking care of my child. if she put some music it will stop recording but you can put a setting to auto record that when the music is turn off it will start recording again.

Reviews.Title: TOO DIFFICULT!
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Too difficult to set up! Couldn't set alarm.  Couldn't set the camera! Too diff for my brain. Thouggt it would be 123.

Reviews.Title: Great Seller...Highly Recomend
Reviews.Author: Paul Thompson
Reviews.Content: Super fast transaction and shipping. Product works great. A little hard to understand programming but with a little patience and pursistance, was able to figure out. Would buy from this seller any time.

Reviews.Title: Does not work.
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: It froze and did not work, malfunctioning garbage.I would not recommend buying this product at all. Do not waste your money unless you're into the expensive paperweight thing.

Reviews.Title: It will get the job done.
Reviews.Author: Tom Bruno
Reviews.Content: It will get the job done. A little user unfriendly but it will do the jog I need it for. It will hopefully catch the thief soon.

Reviews.Title: spy camera no so great
Reviews.Author: tim carroll
Reviews.Content: the camera's instructions are horrible.  microscopic writing, written by someone who does not know proper english, and the instructions do not really explain clearly how to operate the device.the night vision does not work past 2 feet.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: M. doctor
Reviews.Content: I order this camera just to play with and see how it works. The instructions was very simple and it works very well. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Sound didn't work on a clock RADIO
Reviews.Author: RooBear
Reviews.Content: Whether playing music from your phone, or from an SD card, the sound would cut out after about 30 seconds, give or take. You would then have to turn the device on and off, then it would do the same thing - work for 30 seconds, then shut off - the screen still showed the music playing, but no sound came out. Also, video would record, but even with the sound setting ON, the videos recorded no sound. Also, I would never use this as a hidden camera, given that it's obvious that it is a recording device, obvious camera on the front, obvious recording dot on the screen at all times when recording, and if you forget to exit out of the "secret" screen, the next time you go to use the music or anything, it goes right to the secret screen, not the regular screen. The video is decent, as long as the subject matter is relatively still. My cat was getting sick and I suspected she was drinking toilet water, and this caught her in the act! But that was about all - a blurry fuzz ball on screen - since she was moving around so much - and the night mode didn't work well - you can still kind of tell, but it's only a center circle of vision, the corners all remain dark, maybe that's inevitable. No motion-activated video mode... Also, very expensive. I returned mine. Also, it was missing the cord that connects the device to the wall outlet, luckily I was able to get one on my own, and amazon is great with all of my concerns and questions. The seller also tried to be helpful, but it's just a faulty item, as I see many others have also experienced. I wouldn't recommend this unless you have time and possibly money to waste on hoping you get one that works and stays functional. Oh - and the radio, even after adjusting the settings, is blurry and confusing so you can't really save stations well, and they are still coming in fuzzy so you don't want to hear it.

Reviews.Title: so complicated
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Benshoff
Reviews.Content: I can't seem to put it all together.  The instructions are miniscule and it just seems to complicated, and no, I don't have a grandson who can do it for me.  Would love to send it back

Reviews.Title: Not for us
Reviews.Author: Floetta
Reviews.Content: The camera came with easy to use instructions, but it didn't rotate. We returned it because it didn't suit our purposes.

Reviews.Title: very small
Reviews.Author: kid's dad
Reviews.Content: purchased this to watch the baby sitter. unit is very small, no unbelievably small.  most would look at it and think it may be a recording device as it can not functions as a reasonable clock radio.  FM did not work, returned

Reviews.Title: Avoid
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "A Freak"
Reviews.Content: I had great expectations after reading some reviews. After unpacking and reading the instructions (needing a magnifying glass for the micro printing) I put it to work. I set it to record when I left for work. I came home to find that the unit battery was dead....it had charged overnight. I checked the files....it had only recorded sporadically, about 1/2 hr. I recharged the battery. I went to set it again. While in the menu it up and died. Garbage! At least I was able to return it Amazon for a refund.

Reviews.Title: battery trouble?
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: I bought this and am overall happy with it. Some problems though. The battery shows fully charged on the screen but everytime I unplug the unit to watch files on my PC I have to RESET the clock! Isn't the battery supposed to keep the time set? The field of view is kinda narrow but I can work with that. Also is there some film on the screen that needs to be peeled off?Thanks

Reviews.Title: Spy terrible
Reviews.Author: Judy David
Reviews.Content: Item is too small. Froze after setting clock. Never turned off.  Directions difficult and tiny. Not even close to the advertisement. Looks like a toy.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Izzy
Reviews.Content: as silly as it sounds I got this camera to spy on my cats; they are always picking fights and causing disasters in the house when I am away, so I got this and sure enough I was able to catch the culprit red pawed so to speak; funny thing is she walked right over to the camera and did the "na na na na na" right in the camera eye and walked off, so I was able to find out who is terrorizing who now I have moved it to another room to make sure it's just the one. Being a small easily moved camera makes this great, the night vision is good. I am not a fan of the limited instructions, I am very intuitive when it comes to technology but this camera takes some getting used to, once I accessed the hidden features it is difficult to know whether or not the camera is actually working. I like the fact this is compact and does what it says it will do and was affordable. I do recommend this for certain, the price can't be beat......and no one would ever realize that they were being watched. I was totally unable to get the radio feature to work but that was not why I bought it so I am still happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and records/stores great video (and lots of it)
Reviews.Author: M. Disher "Big Dish"
Reviews.Content: This is a solid piece of equipment.  Easy to use and records quite a bit (several days at a time) of video.  Looks like a little mini-clock, and cannot be accessed by someone who doesn't know HOW to use the secret recording/playback functions.  Exactly what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Works very well for what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: J F
Reviews.Content: I have only used it for the secret camera recording and found it to work very well. I needed to know what was going on in my place while I was not there and this camera did that for me. It over-writes the recording in an ongoing loop which is a nice feature if you can't check it for a few days. The instructions are not easy to understand but the ones the shipper emailed helped considerably, you just need to keep reading them. Also the light on the clock is extremely bright and I put a see thru colored vinyl cover over the clock making sure not to cover the camera lens part.

Reviews.Title: Great Item, Great Seller
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I had a problem with the item not turning on when I got it so I emailed the seller and almost immediately got a reply telling me the solution was to take out and put back in the battery (Takes seconds and doesn't require any extra tools). This fixed the problem and the item has worked flawlessly ever since. Much better than I expected for the price!

Reviews.Title: A great little Cam
Reviews.Author: A person who does a lot of reading
Reviews.Content: Product does all that it promises. It was a little difficult to understand at first but once you get the hang of it the product works just fine. I wish the manual was larger becasue it was difficult to read. It is smaller than I expected it to be but then that is what makes it perfect for travel. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Very neat gizmo!
Reviews.Author: beago
Reviews.Content: The item came super quick, even earlier than was estimated in the confirmation email.  It's a very neat little gizmo!  I'm glad I went to the seller's youtube instructions, ([...] made it much easier to understand the programming.  I am older generation and not tech-smart/quick, so I was pleased to be able to get the thing all set and ready to go.It's main purpose is to catch me sleepwalking and hiding candy at night.  I need to prove to myself that it is me doing all this, and not someone playing practical jokes.  Well, I know that it's me...but it will be helpful to my doctor to see what time it happens, the duration, anything that might've occurred before & afterwards.  Of course nothing showed at my two sleep studies.The device is very inconspicuous, and even kinda cute/attactive...definitely not cheap feeling at all.  After the night-time mystery is solved, I'm sure this device will enjoy many other uses.  The sound quality seemed pretty good, so that will be something to think about if I want to use it for that purpose later.Agree with other posters, an alarm clock feature would've made it a complete package.  I don't mind the 24-hour time format.UPDATE 8/9/13 -- just wanted to add that Nick, the seller, is outstanding to work with.  I just had a very minor issue come up after two months of very satisfactory performance, and Nick quickly responded with complete resolution.  He is a delight to work with, and I wish he sold more stuff!  This little unit is really a good device.

Reviews.Title: Excellent seller very good security camera
Reviews.Author: Paul7
Reviews.Content: The seller to date has been excellent.  The charging cord which also provides continuous plug in is very short about 2 feet.  Purchase a usb to usb extension and that will help.  The seller recommends a 6 class micro card but that hasn't been discussed by other reviewers to date and the recommendation is made in the emailed instructions.  I'm using a class 4 32GB micro card and that seems ok.  The sellers emailed instructions and posted video at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZPqF25zfC5k are excellent.  The camera does not have motion detection (It is not advertised as having this feature) and only a 24 hour clock.  It does what is stated.  I have had the camera/ clock for less than a week and so far am satisfied with my purchase and would recommend this seller.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Patricia McDow
Reviews.Content: This little camera works great! I was a little worried with the purchase, but everything works just as described. The only thing I would like to see improvement on is the width of the view. I expected to be able to capture more of my office with it, but I can only capture about half of my office. Other than that, this product is a great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Spy Cam
Reviews.Author: NB Stevens "nanbobs"
Reviews.Content: Inadequate instructions on set-up and operation. Needs better translation to English. Had to fix battery contacts, they came loose. The battery compartment is weak.

Reviews.Title: Even a non-technical housewife set up this spy cam!
Reviews.Author: C. Waite "The ultimate online shopper"
Reviews.Content: I watched Nick's demo video from onlineenterprises888 and set this spy cam up to record a crime.  You think all the true crime shows on TV seem "out there".  It'll never happen to you or a loved one...right?  WRONG! Horrible, health-threatening, even life-threatening, dirty little secrets happen to everyday people.  You know something's wrong, you usually even know who's doing it, but oooooh...they have a pretty good game going on.  They've set the stage and turned the tables...but only with words.  This spy cam will show the true actions and evils of the people who seem to love you best; the criminal, immoral, mind-blowing acts that speak louder than words. Catch them, get the proof, stop the threats.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: B. Maxwell
Reviews.Content: Fast and simple easy to use.....Could be a little bigger, and letters easier to read on top of the camera

Reviews.Title: Good for the money but far from excellent!
Reviews.Author: Bogdan
Reviews.Content: Takes for ever to figure our even with the detailed instructions provided on a sheet of paper.  An average person with no tech background such as my wife may be having difficulties. Also that default function throws you in Chinese language.  Luckily I speak Chinese and read it, but if you don't you are out of luck.  The item also looks cheap so unless you are using it in a school dorm that silly blue light on the base will make it look completely out of place.  I also feel that this item costs $20 on a street market in China...The seller deserves a thumbs up for doing him best to help.  Bravo!

Reviews.Title: Does not come with everything you need.
Reviews.Author: Tasha Wineinger
Reviews.Content: The notation didn't say anything about needing an additional memory card. It works okay, but it also looks like it could be used for something else besides a clock (gives it away a bit).

Reviews.Title: Its good until its not.
Reviews.Author: Lauren Watkins
Reviews.Content: My spy camera was good in the beginning. However all the sudden it stopped working when I needed it the most. :(  Don't buy.

Reviews.Title: wasted potential. and money.
Reviews.Author: Thew "Thew"
Reviews.Content: This is a great concept, but like most cheap imports, it fails to deliver in virtually every way imaginable. This device looks clean, the shell feels sturdy-ish, and it is simple to set up and use. But, for $80, I expect a product to last longer than 2 days. Where the case feels fairly sturdy because it is metal, the buttons are the lowest quality you can imagine. When switching media player functions, one of the volume/scroll buttons collapsed inside the unit, and subsequently forced the unit to be stuck on full blast. While trying to fix this, the device would start to pay a song, then randomly fast forward or skip. It is now completely useless. And I'm not exaggerating about the two days but either. I received this on Monday evening, and it was am expensive paperweight before the end of Wednesday office hours. Do yourself and your wallet a favorite by spending your money on something better.

Reviews.Title: Rating on Mini Clock Radio Hidden DVR
Reviews.Author: donjohnson
Reviews.Content: It's not user friendly, it is set on military time which the average person with a clock doesn't use, with no option setting to change, web cam only if connected to computer, power pack will shut down without power supply, just goes black screen on battery. Video of spy camera only goes through settings with little info of what all the other's do. Manual Sucks !!!!! Basic black n silver color for clock with power supply cord totally bright white... Stupid on that part, should have be basic black..... Video on youtube for setting up skips a lot of info ... totally unhappy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Joseph McCormack
Reviews.Content: Had it for 1 day, and now half the screen is white out for both the clock and the menus.

Reviews.Title: SPY CAMERA
Reviews.Author: cheryl crump
Reviews.Content: DIFFICULT TO OPERATION.  INSTRUCTION WAS CONFUSING AND COULD NOT GET THE ITEM TO WORK AS IT SAID IT WOULD.  NOT A GOOD BUY

Reviews.Title: I liked it it was pretty neato.
Reviews.Author: Walter Velasquez
Reviews.Content: I like it because it helps me spy on myself when Im getting undressed . Im naughty ... ooh yeah

Reviews.Title: Great and discreet camera!
Reviews.Author: Gina Carter
Reviews.Content: This is a great device and I use it daily to monitor my place while I'm out.For all-day recording I use the included USB Power adapter that I just plug into an outlet, but for short-term use (around 3 or hours or less) I run it off of battery power.After following the directions provided by the seller, onlineenterprises888 (who is GREAT by the way), I found the camera very easy to use for recording and playback purposes.  I also like that I can easily upload any footage I've recorded directly to my laptop via the USB cable and save it for future reference.The video and audio quality are outstanding for such a small device as well which was a very pleasant surprise.  When in record mode it just looks like a regular little digital clock so it's discreet if not practically unnoticeable.I have yet to use it as a Webcam but may try that soon and will update accordingly.

Reviews.Title: look no further...this is it...
Reviews.Author: D W GICHERU
Reviews.Content: I usually don't consider writing product reviews as I assume that most manufacturers on amazon have a reasonable good product to sell.I went through different product reviews before deciding on this gadget.My main reason was the fact that it was handy and could be operated without any cabling work or mains power attachedso I bought it and it went into a drawer waiting for the time I will need to travel2 weeks ago my daughter who is 21/2 years old complained that she did not like the babysitter who slapped her a number of times.She kept crying when we were leaving her at home but as a dad I assumed she would get over a new face.After a couple of days I thought it over and thought I would better set the camera up and see wlhat comes up.Setting it up was a breeze though the small print on the instruction manual requires reading glasses as the font size is too too smallThe results from the first day of filming gave me all the proof we needed to see what was. going on.The quality of the camera is impressive to say the least.Nothing of the normal grainy black and white CCTV images.the recording is as clear and sharp as I would have expected of a camera more pricier than it is.sound is acceptable.if one wants something to cover a large warehouse or shop area then this is not for you but for domestic use or in small or moderate areas this is it.I would not hesitate to buy another one if this gets misplaced

Reviews.Title: works perfect
Reviews.Author: phil evans
Reviews.Content: way better quality than i expected could use a longer cord. The picture quality is exelant , worth the price.

Reviews.Title: GREAT WORK.
Reviews.Author: JAMES DUSSAP
Reviews.Content: I JUST CANT WAIT TO REALY USE IT.IT'S VERY CLEAR.AND COMPACT.A MUST HAVE FOR THE HOME.WITH OUT ALL THE EXCESS THINGS YOU WOULD HAVE TO DO.TO INSTALL A SECURITY SYSTEM.

Reviews.Title: A good investment for peace of mind
Reviews.Author: calcomb
Reviews.Content: I really like this .. but it is a bit difficult to manage if you happen to misplace the tiny how-to manual

Reviews.Title: Works, but no sound
Reviews.Author: Stalwaty "csmudricks"
Reviews.Content: This clock is sturdy and works. The instructions are non-existant but that is par for the course buying stuff like this. The night vision works pretty well, but has to be fairly close (within a few feet)  to be effective. My big problem is that it doesn't record sound. If they'd have mentioned that I wouldn't have purchased that as there are a lot of options that do have sound out there.

Reviews.Title: Way tiny!
Reviews.Author: Michael Loftis
Reviews.Content: They call it mini when they aught to be calling it micro.  It's so small that the included USB cable for running it is too stiff and tips it.  Not only that the USB cable is very short so be prepared to have your own.  The size could either be a positive or a negative depending on what you're looking for.

Reviews.Title: Not to sure yet
Reviews.Author: B. Dail "Starlight"
Reviews.Content: This is small enough to be taken for a small clock except for the bright red light on the cord.  The instruction paperwork is so small you need a magnifier to read it so I did have problems with setting it up.  I do like the idea of taking it with me when I travel, it will be great for hotel room security.

Reviews.Title: Broke in 10 seconds!
Reviews.Author: Bearcat Chris
Reviews.Content: The directions were "worthless", so I was lucky enough to find a YouTube video that explained how to use it.  So with that, I finally figured how to turn it on, and it worked for 10 seconds, and then the screen went totally (and forever) GREEN.  An absolute piece of junk.  DO NOT BUY THIS!!!

Reviews.Title: Operation
Reviews.Author: Bill "ms-billt"
Reviews.Content: The manual font is so small it was not readable- I had to copy it and magnify it several time to read it.  The operation was not fully expained.  Nor  did it operate in detail as explained.  The camera was of good quality and produced very fine pictures and sound-  but to give it to a non technical person is a disaster.

Reviews.Title: Not recommended
Reviews.Author: FM
Reviews.Content: Its ok at first until it freezes up and becomes unresponsive to anything you do except remove the battery. Two weeks and then it just stop working.

Reviews.Title: Semi satisfied
Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these mini clock cams. One works great and one was defective ,Grainy video and scratchy sound.The video appears to be high quality on the working model. I like the endless loop feature.I do question the quality control if it was defective out of the box

Reviews.Title: Its Awesome!
Reviews.Author: A. Perry
Reviews.Content: It works perfect! The view is wide and unexpected and covers more area than I thought.  The sound is great and picks up very well.

Reviews.Title: exactly what I needed exactly what I ordered
Reviews.Author: Richard Cooper "Richard"
Reviews.Content: thank you very much everything worked perfectly very happy with my purchase uh uh may need some more thank you very much bye

Reviews.Title: easy and it works!
Reviews.Author: saramomm
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and it works!! I'm not technical at all and I figured it out.... if you are looking for something easily set up that works then this is it!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy.
Reviews.Author: Charles Green
Reviews.Content: I chose this mini to monitor my home while I'm away. The directions are very incomplete, they donot explain how to set the camera up or record, and hard to read.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: William "American"
Reviews.Content: I bought this item on August 24, 2013.  It worked as advertised until September 25, 2013, when it completely crashed.  I left it plugged in to its AC adapter to prevent stress on the battery and to use as a clock.  A month of service is ridiculous even for low cost "Made in China" stuff.  Save your money.

Reviews.Title: Could be a great product, but quality control is horrible.
Reviews.Author: Diego A. Montiel
Reviews.Content: I thought this would be a great idea detect theft attempts or undue personnel behavior in my hotel room while traveling overseas.The product is smaller that I thought it would be. I consider that a plus as it reduces the volume in my suitcase. It is pretty, looks good and feels solid and heavy. The speakers occupy both sides and the screen uses almost the entire face of the clock. It came up with a mini DVD, headphones, USB cable to connect it to the computer and USB head to power it, as well as a small instruction booklet. So far, so good.The print is tiny, much like the one in a medicine bottle. I had trouble reading it even with a magnifying glass. A scanned image at high resolution and then enlarged solved this issue. I had trouble following them as they are brief, unclear, definitely not well written. I decided to try the DVD, expecting a step by step video. I inserted it in my laptop and it did not recognize it, not even after several attempts.I turned it on to attempt to discover its capabilities on my own and see it in action. To avoid wearing down the battery, I tried to plug it in. The USB plug is not a match for the slot!!! It is larger! Trying to avoid a return, I decided to take it to an electronics store and purchase a cable that would fit. The salesperson brought the appropriate cable, looked again at the slot and told me that it was misaligned. I guess that while packing, someone tried to make it fit, couldn't but packed it anyway and left the product damaged. So much for quality control.I am now overseas with a device that I cannot charge and for which I do not know how to use. Returning it from abroad is expensive and cumbersome and even if I got a replacement I am not sure if I could learn how to use it. I just hope the mini DVD supplies that information in a clear manner. I will take the DVD to a computer store to see if they can extract the information and the product to an electronic store repair to have the slot repaired and the proper cable. All this, of course, will be at my own risk and expense.Amazon... this is my worst experience with you EVER!

Reviews.Title: "USA ship" but made in the cheap end of China--(not bashing China, just stating facts as they produce it)...
Reviews.Author: Tried n True "BeSmarterThanYesterday"
Reviews.Content: [All comments in brackets are my updated review after two weeks of use.][I had mine for almost two weeks and I have to add this update to warn others of this cheap product!][The below "Cons" was my first impression after a quick use of the item. I now have to remove the "Pros" segment from my first review because of my experience since. The Pros was its multi-features: MP3, camera, vd and audio record, and a clock; and good camera resolution; however, all things considered, this is a compiled flop for an $80 item. Every time I look at this item, it reminds me to ask myself, "When will it break?" Well, from a usage stand-point, it just broke. I was sold on some amazing 5 star "in your dreams" reviews; NOW, I want to give others a heads up from my reality perspective. Here's what I experienced since:][The battery power ONLY on clock mode didn't last for two days after a full charge. The clock went out in about 9+ hours. You have to keep the short (2') USB plugged to a power source if you want the simple clock mode to work on an uninterupted basis, this is standard with any clock device. You *might* get 30-40 minutes (on my first full battery charge and recording time seems to drop thereonafter) of vd recording time on battery and that's not in the infrared mode which seems to reduce recording time to about 18-25 minutes. (Recording time might differ depending on the state of the generic battery that came with your unit.) The generic battery included is not a lithium battery--I assume this by its short power life (all wording on the battery is in Chinese and battery type is missing also missing in the English portion of the instruction booklet). The instruction book states the Nokia Li-on BL-5C is a compatible battery which you have to purchase separately. After the clock on battery went out, I plugged in the USB to recharge battery and for whatever reason the SD card in the shabby back slot spat out/shot out/ejected itself a few inches from the SD port! Is it suppose to do that? I doubt it, NO. $80 dollars of headache, guessing, assumptions, unpredictable behaviors, and unknowns make this item unreliable and a rip off at $80.00! Maybe, had they focused only on the vd recording feature disguised as a clock, this item could have been useful; instead, it got pare down with too much features and everything got diluted to tasteless water. I would not recommend this item except to my enemies so they would be bogged down in frustrations.][Below was part of my original review; I have removed the "Pros" segment, which was mainly the multi-features which turned out to be watered down additives.]Cons: It a cheaply made low quality gadget. The selection buttons are slow-responsive, not accurate, "menu" and "mode" button function overlaps in certain commands, innards look cheap (you can see some of the internal after *dropping out the battery*--the battery just sits into place, held up by an under plate of cheap clear toy quality plastic; no spring hinge and no tension holding it in place, just the cheap bottom cover. The bottom cover can easily break off if you snap the tiny thin hinges too hard or too often. If you lose the use of the bottom cover, the battery would just drop out. It is that cheap. The instruction booklet is the worst size 6 font, 2x3, 8 page booklet I've ever read (I didn't bother using it beyond the "hold both volumes" button down to access the *spy feature menu*); I figure everything out on my own. The electric wall adaptor is cheaply made too (the USB mates loosely with the adaptor leaving about 1/8 of the USB neck exposed and at a slant--you have to keep the item plugged to the AC/DC outlet and I can't help but wonder if the cheap USB adaptor would fry and cause a fire--I HOPE NOT--it's that cheap in quality). I'm not a package freak, beautiful packaging means more waste for landfills, but this item look like something you pick out from a pile of table want-nots off a street seller after no one bought it for a long time. You'll have to repackage the entire content if you want to give it as a gift.

Reviews.Title: I've been to chinese factories , they're clueless.
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: cons:The instruction booklet is the smallest you've ever seen and impossible for me to read so luckily i found it on youtube, Military time, no motion detection,the date looks like this 20 13-07-23 so why the space between 20 and 13? well because chinese factories are idiots, power cord is white and has a bright red light on it why? because chinese factories are idiots so i painted mine black ,doesn't come with sd card which is fine but tell me ahead of time.pros: able to view on the mini monitor, quality is decent, looks cheap enough that it probably won't get stolen.Use this as a way to keep an eye on your hotel or any place where you don't care if people are suspicious of this awkward looking clock.The more i use this thing the more i feel it just looks suspicious.There are too many things that draw unwanted attention. I'm spending the 395.00 for a real camera.You can buy a longer cord that will plug into the usb port on the electrical plug.

Reviews.Title: Very cool little device
Reviews.Author: Miss Pixie
Reviews.Content: It is incredibly cool! It took me a while to figure it out- which is great because knowing what I was looking for took me that long, so for people that don't know what it is, it won't be possible.Night vision is amazing, and quality can be too- although I choose low quality so I have more space. This thing is very useful and makes me feel much safer.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Gunnar
Reviews.Content: It is a little small but it works for the purpose of seeing who is stealing things. I was impressed with the quality of the image. Dont worry if you are hesitant go ahead and buy you wont regret. And I found who was taking things!!!!

Reviews.Title: Did not meet needs
Reviews.Author: Mary L. Doxsee
Reviews.Content: need it to motion sensitive, with a longer running time, screen too small, looks bigger in photo, pieces too small,

Reviews.Title: No paper instructions.
Reviews.Author: Cheryl S. Morgan
Reviews.Content: The disk that had all of the instructions on how to operate it will not play, in my computer or dvd player. Tried going to the web site for help. I couldn't find a site that wasn't canceled. I like the quality of the screen. The radio does not pick up any stations and there is no antenna. It has been a long process to figure out how to set the camera. We are still struggling with it,

Reviews.Title: Difficult to set up
Reviews.Author: Jason J Perkins
Reviews.Content: The instruction manual is no help. The online video fails to show exactly which buttone to push to access the settings. Pushing the 2 buttons simultaneously does get to the hidden options but the idiot on the video FAILS to show which button he presses to get the options to change.Other than the difficulty trying to set up this thing the cord is too short to be of any practical use.Furthermore this thing should have a motion detection setting but does NOT.This thing definitely isnt worth the price and I am not pleased with the purchase at all.SAVE YOUR MONEY AND DONT WASTE YOUR TIME BUYING THIS GARBAGE.

Reviews.Title: Misleading
Reviews.Author: Robbin Diaz
Reviews.Content: One of the options that I was looking for was the motion detection option.When I purchased this product, it stated that it had this option, but I was mislead.

Reviews.Title: Why I dislike the camera
Reviews.Author: Patsy Fields
Reviews.Content: i chose this rating because when I received it the spy camera was broke.  The "ok" button was jammed and then to return it I had to pay postage.  I do not think this is right.  The camera was broke when I opened package.  I didnot send the San Disk back because I open that too,  I don't know what I will use them for.  I  read I could not send unopened package back, that is another reason I will not be ordering from Amazon any more.  Thanks Patsy

Reviews.Title: dud
Reviews.Author: Cat
Reviews.Content: Cant figure it out...kund of waisted 80 bucks. My bad :( there has got be  a way to figure this thing out

Reviews.Title: Disappointed but...
Reviews.Author: C. Philippides "philico"
