Reviews.Content: Item had some scratches at the bottom of the screen when it arrived. This was a minor issue. Nevertheless, item stopped working altogether 40 days later and of course after the return policy expired. I'm now stuck with something that is useless and cannot be returned.Noted when it was working, the field of view of the camera lens was limited. No wide angle mode was possible. As a result, it was difficult to find a position to place the camera so that it can capture my face and not my waist...The menu also needs some major overhaul to become friendly. The operation of the buttons is counter intuitive and you probably need to keep the tiny manual that came with it around.Update: I returned the failed unit and promptly received back a new one. I also naively send the unit back via regular mail without insurance and not in the original box but despite all the shortcomings, I was truly impressed with the seller's honesty and commitment to standing by his product because I got back a brand new one.Update2: Well, the replacement unit freezes too. It does that every couple of months, though there is no discernible pattern of lockups, a workaround is to take the battery off with USB cable disconnected and immediately connect it back. If you are lucky, it will preserve the previous settings and will continue from where it left. Otherwise you need to go one more round to set it back again.I begin to suspect that the product is being put together with little thought in quality control. It is mediocre in it's operation and given the high frequency and the randomness of the freezes, it can be hardly trusted to keep your valuables safe.

Reviews.Title: Won't recognize the RAM
Reviews.Author: Matthew - IT Support Expert
Reviews.Content: No matter what type of SD card I tried the unit would not recognize it.  It just kept saying "No RAM installed"  Yet if I took the RAM out while it was on I got a SD card read error.  Then if I installed the RAM it would show Zero for Capacity, Used, and Available.  Trying to format the SD card just bricked it.  After bricking 2 SD cards I stopped.

Reviews.Title: Item isn't quite as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Sitarakube "Sitarakube"
Reviews.Content: What they don't tell you is that it only comes with a 12 inch charging cord and while in use, only holds a charge for approximately 2 hours.  So, even if you have a 32 memory card, if it's not plugged into the wall it's useless. The whole point for me, was to have this on a table high enough for my toddler not to be able to reach it, by limiting my ability to plug this in by 12 inches, I have to put it within reach of my son, which renders it useless. So much for a nanny cam. The seller also claims that the item works with any USB extension cable, which is false. I have tried two separate cables, one verizon and one universal and neither work, only the cord it comes with. I will most likely be sending this back.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use and Good Quality Video
Reviews.Author: K. Arakaki
Reviews.Content: I used this in an attempt to catch an office thief.  The camera comes with instructions from the seller which are very precise and easy to understand, as the manufacturer instructions may be somewhat confusing.The video quality is excellent and I have not had any problems in recording or replaying footage.  Just remember to get the mini micro sandisk(?).  The advertisement does not make clear that this needs to be purchased separately.

Reviews.Title: hard to operate
Reviews.Author: Al Vissers
Reviews.Content: could not get it to record at all, to small for my use, hard to figure out settings, returned it.

Reviews.Title: good investment
Reviews.Author: inetlady
Reviews.Content: Palm size. On all time.  If it came with motion sensed recording I would get another and 12hr time would be helpful.

Reviews.Title: Works but not really
Reviews.Author: Westport "RN"
Reviews.Content: This camera is weak at best, it has lots of useless features, but fails on the ones I really want.  The camera shot is too narrow.  It records for a minimum of 10 minutes each time it detects movement, however it does not always detect movement when it should.  The worst part is that even in stealth mode the screen flashes when it starts recording.  Also, the unit gets really hot.

Reviews.Title: Failed and unable to work after only a few uses.
Reviews.Author: Marlon Scott
Reviews.Content: I was able to use this product twice before it failed.  When I set it to start recording the third time, it simply froze.  I was unable to turn it off, and had to disconnect the battery to reset it.  Don't waste your money. This item is junk.I will say that the few videos it was able to record had decent quality. But the item is now useless.

Reviews.Title: NO MOTION DETECTION
Reviews.Author: prettyyeyes386
Reviews.Content: Dont know what is all the rave about this product.  It is hard to use according to its instructions and I am a very technical person.  I bought a SD card reader so I can play the video back and watch on my computer, but to watch a whole day of just pure nothing (hour after hour) and then it will erase the next day if you dont get to watch it, is a pure waste of money.  I just dont have free time like that to watch useless video.Spend a little more and get a good product with Motion Detection.

Reviews.Title: very nice!
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Deviney
Reviews.Content: This is a great little spy camera highly recommend this baby,  it truly works as it says it will very happy!

Reviews.Title: If you buy this, be grateful for Amazon's return policy.
Reviews.Author: Erwin Basil
Reviews.Content: Cannot be used with my computerWill not work with my computer. (Windows 7, 64 bit.)Needs Driver,Cannot be used without computer.Locks in Exit mode in 2 different sub-settings.Bought it because of youtube.com instructionsInstructions printed too small to read.If you buy this, be grateful for Amazon's return policy.

Reviews.Title: total junk nothing works
Reviews.Author: verna chadwick
Reviews.Content: nothing works just clock,  wont even work as a web cam the drivers software is no good. the radio don't work. clock only thing works and looks like lost 1 minute in an hour so far.

Reviews.Title: Catch him in the act
Reviews.Author: Jody chatman
Reviews.Content: Catch them in the act. They never knew what ever happen. Good for catching who been taken your money and lying About it.

Reviews.Title: Hard to use.
Reviews.Author: Lora Klassen
Reviews.Content: I've been trying for a week to operate this as a camera.  The manual is so tiny I have to read it with a magnifying glass.  I gave up and told my husband to order another one and specify "easy to operate." He did, and ended up with the very same one. I now have two of them.  I finally read in the fine print manual that we need a micro-SD card.  I ordered that today and it is estimated to be here sometime in Sept. Now all I can do is hope that it will allow me to be able to operate the video mode. If not, I will have an SD card that I can't use. I did get the clock set but it doesn't pick up and FM stations here.

Reviews.Title: Never got to use it!!
Reviews.Author: Billy Patterson
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product expecting to receive something worth my money but I haven't even got to use it! The shipping was great but the product was a disappointment. It did not work. I turned it on and all I got was a solid white screen with nothing else. I contacted the seller and they were very nice and quick to respond. I explained my problem and they made note that it was a common problem they have had with this product. They said they would send a replacement as soon as possible and in the meantime to fill out a product return which I did on the 9th day of this month and still no replacement yet. I did my part and yet I feel as though I got jacked out of $73.00 !!

Reviews.Title: Amazing seller, Great nanny camera!!
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: Update: Seller was amazing, he exchanged it with a new one and even paid the return shipping. Also he is super fast at answering questions and very helpful. I even left my SD card in the cam I sent back and he mailed it to me with no problems.-The new camera I received works much better.No issues yet.Original post: When I first got it I really liked the design, its small and not cheap/cheesy looking. It is actually a clock I would have in my house. The directions are slim to no help at all I learned how to use it from playing around with it a few hours and googling the device. I was planning on using this as a nanny cam and I work 12 hours a day so I plugged it in so I could record all day, set it up. The first day I tried to use it I came home to the screen off and the clock was hot to the touch, the screen would not reboot until I took the battery out for 20 min and then put it back in. When it finally turned on the screen was flickering, and had several lines through it. Also when I went to review the video It had only recorded for the first 60 min. then nothing after that. Still a week after this happened the screen still flickering and has lines through it I know its not a memory issues because I bought a well known name brand 32GB SD card. I really wish this clock worked like it is supposed to. :(

Reviews.Title: haven't really used it yet
Reviews.Author: janette
Reviews.Content: I have a crappy computer and have not been able to look at the directions on how to use it so makes it very difficult to rate.  I've played with it a bit and it seems very durable and good.

Reviews.Title: I bought something that was suppsed to work, sure fooled me.
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: After about 2 weeks I  noticed the time was not changing. I tried to reset it and it kept freezing, took the power way to reset it same result.  A total waste of money in two ways since you have to buy the SD chip it is suposed to use. One star means "I hate it." I can't give it lower than one star but I don't hate it I loath it.  I feel totally ripped off with this POS.If you get the urge to buy this just flush about $95 down the toilet you'll get the same end result. Amazon should screen what's being sold here better.

Reviews.Author: kevin  m. mcgrath
Reviews.Content: Great Price would do it al over again easilyWhy the hell do I have to write so many  words  said i was good??Great Price would do it al over again easilyWhy the hell do I have to write so many  words  said i was good??Great Price would do it al over again easilyWhy the hell do I have to write so many  words  said i was good??Duhhh
